"A crucial problem facing our Center for Bio-Inspired Fuel Production (Bisfuel) at ASU and similar research groups around the world is discovering an efficient, inexpensive catalyst for oxidizing water to oxygen gas, hydrogen ions and electrons," said ASU Regents' Professor Devens Gust, the center's director.

"Un problema crucial contra nostre Centro pro production de combustibile solar Bio-inspirate al Universitate statal del Arizona e gruppos de recerca simile trans le mundo, es discoperir un catalysator efficiente e economic pro oxydar le aqua a gas oxygeno, iones hydrogeno e electrones," diceva Devens Gust le professor del regente ASU, director del centro.

"Once the mechanism of photosynthetic water oxidation is understood, chemists can begin to design artificial photosynthetic catalysts that will allow them to produce useful fuels using sunlight."

"un vice que le mechanismo del oxydation photosynthetic del aqua essera comprendite, le chimicos pote initiar a projectar catalysator photosynthetic artificial que permittera a illes de producer combustibiles utile per le luce solar."
"Photosynthetic organisms already know how to do this, and we need to know the details of how photosynthesis carries out the process using abundant manganese and calcium.
"organismos photosynthetic jam sape quomodo facer isto, e nos necessita cognoscer le detalios de como le photosynthese exeque le processo usante abundante manganese e calcium.

"Le recerca per Fromme e collaboratores da nos, per le le prime vice, un reguardo a como le catalysator muta su structura dum illo es operante," addeva Gust.
"The trick is to use the world's most powerful X-ray laser, named LCLS, located at the Department of Energy's SLAC National Accelerator Laboratory," said Fromme.
"Le artificio es le usage del plus potente laser a radios X del mundo, denominate LCLS, ubicate al Department of Energy's SLAC National Accelerator Laboratory," diceva Fromme.

<e0>in notes: </e0>search in notes to segments
<e0>in le notas: </e0>cerca in le notas del segmentos

<e0>in le fonte: </e0>cerca in le segmentos fonte

<e0>repository: </e0>the place where the shared material is saved and maintained, either on a local access network or in Internet.
<e0>repository: </e0>le posto ubi le material in commun es salvate e mantenite, sia sur un rete a accesso local sia in interrete.
<e0>search TMs</e0>: translation memories in the <f1>tm</f1> folder are included in the search.
<e0>recerca TMs</e0>: le memorias de traduction in le plica <f1>tm</f1> son includite in le recerca.
<e0>several projects on the same subject: </e0>keep the project structure, and change source and target folders (Source = source/order1, target = target/order1 etc).
<e0>plure projectos sur le mesme subjecto: </e0>retene le structura del projecto, e cambia plicas fonte e destination (Fonte = source/order1, destination = target/order1 etc).
<e0>several translators working on the same project:</e0> split the source files into source/Alice, source/Bob... and allocate them to team members (Alice, Bob ...).
<e0>plure traductores laborante sur le mesme projecto:</e0> finde le files fonte in source/Alice, source/Bob... e ubica los a membros del equipa (Alice, Bob ...).
<e0>update local files from the local repository copy</e0> - the changes received from the server repository reside within the .svn subfolder but not yet in the files and folders themselves.
<e0>renova le files local ex le copia local del deposito</e0> - le cambios recipite del deposito del server demora intra le sub plica .svn ma non ancora in le files e plicas ipse.
<e0>user</e0>: a member of the team, collaborating on the common project.
<e0>usator</e0>: un membro del equipa, que collabora sur le projecto commun.

<e0> Instant start guide:</e0> this chapter is intended as an Instant Start Guide for beginners and “tyre kickers”, showing the complete procedure from opening a new translation project through to completing the translation.

<e0> Guida de initio rapide:</e0> iste capitulo es designate como un guida de initio rapide pro novicios e curiosos indecise, monstra le procedura complete ab le apertura de un nove projecto de traduction, per le completamento del traduction.

<f0>An international team, led by Arizona State University scientists, has published today in </f0><f1><f2>Nature</f2></f1><f3> a groundbreaking study that shows the first snapshots of photosynthesis in action as it splits water into protons, electrons and oxygen -- the process that maintains Earth's oxygen atmosphere.</f3>

<f0>Split UT</f0>: Selected a row, separates the unit of translation in two new units each of which it will be aligned to blank.
<f0>Finde UT</f0>: seligite un rango, separa le unitate de traduction in duo nove unitates cata del qual illo essera alineate e un rango blanc.
<f0>Split</f0>: Once a row is selected, you must indicate the division point in the row; you just have to click in the edit box before the position where you wish to split the segment.
<f0>Finde</f0>: un vice que es seligite un rango, tu debe indicar su puncto de division; tu debe sol cliccar in le cassa de modifica ante le position ubi tu desira finder le segmento.

<l0>--config-dir=<config-dir></l0> enables OmegaT to be instructed in which folder the configuration files are stored.
<l0>--config-dir=<config-dir></l0> habilita OmegaT a esser instruite in qual plica son servate le files de configuration.
<l0>--config-dir=<config-dir></l0> tells <a1>OmegaT</a1> in which folder the configuration files are stored.
<l0>--config-dir=<config-dir></l0> indica a <a1>OmegaT</a1> in qual plica es servate le files de configuration.
<l0>--disable-project-locking</l0> allows, under Windows, to open the same project with several instances of OmegaT.
<l0>--disable-project-locking</l0> permitte, sub Windows, de aperir le mesme projecto Con plure occurrentias de OmegaT.
<l0>--mode=console-translate </l0> <a1>OmegaT</a1> launches in console mode and translates the given project
<l0>--mode=console-translate </l0> <a1>OmegaT</a1> lancea in modo consola e traduce le projecto date.
<l0>--no-team</l0> addresses projects set up for team work.
<l0>-no-team</l0> adressa le preparation del projectos pro le labor in equipa.
<l0>--source-pattern={regexp} </l0>The files to be translated can be specified this way.
<l0>--source-pattern={regexp} </l0>Le files a traducer pote esser specificate in iste maniera.
<l0>--tag-validation=[abort|warn] </l0> On abort, the program is aborted when tag validation finds errors.
<l0>--tag-validation=[abort|warn] </l0> Sur aborto, le programma es abortate quando le validation del tag discoperi errores.
<l0>--tag-validation=[abort|warn]</l0><p1> outputFileName</p1>
<l0>--tag-validation=[abort|warn]</l0><p1> outputFileName</p1>
<l0>.txt1</l0> files are files in ISO-8859-1, covering most <e1>Western Europe</e1> languages.
Le files <l0>.txt1</l0> son in ISO-8859-1, que coperi le major parte del linguas del <e1>Europa occidental</e1>.
<l0>.txt2</l0> files are files in ISO-8859-2, that covers most <e1>Central and Eastern Europe</e1> languages
Le files <l0>.txt2</l0> son in ISO-8859-2, que concerne le major parte del linguas del <e1>Europa Central e Oriental </e1>
<l0>.txt</l0> files are automatically (<auto>) interpreted by <a1>OmegaT</a1> as being encoded in the computer's default encoding.
Le files <l0>.txt</l0> son automaticamente (<auto>) interpretate per <a1>OmegaT</a1> ut codificate in le codification base prefixate del computator.
<l0>.utf8</l0> files are interpreted by <a1>OmegaT</a1> as being encoded in UTF-8 (an encoding that covers almost all languages in the world).
Le files <l0>.utf8</l0> son interpretate per <a1>OmegaT</a1> como codificate in UTF-8 (un codification que concerne quasi tote le linguas in le mundo).
<l0><Something>\<a1>OmegaT</a1></l0> (<Something> corresponds to the location of the "home" folder as determined by Java)
<l0><Something>\<a1>OmegaT</a1></l0> (<Something> corresponde al location del plica "home" quomodo determinate secundo Java)
<l0><User Home>/.omegat </l0>(.omegat is a folder, the dot preceding its name makes it invisible unless you type ls -a or an equivalent command)
<l0><User Home>/.omegat </l0>(.omegat es un plica, le puncto precedente su nomine rende illo invisibile a minus que tu scribe ls -a o un commando equivalente)

<l0><project-dir></l0> tells <a1>OmegaT</a1> where to find the project to be translated.
<l0><project-dir></l0> indica a <a1>OmegaT</a1> ubi trovar le projecto a traducer.
<l0><project-dir></l0> tells <a1>OmegaT</a1> where to find the project to translate.
<l0><project-dir></l0> dice a <a1>OmegaT</a1> ubi trovar le projecto a traducer.

<u0>Apertium</u0> is a free/open-source machine translation platform, initially aimed at related-language pairs, like CA, ES, GA, PT, OC and FR but recently expanded to deal with more divergent language pairs (such as English-Catalan).

<u0>Apertium</u0> es un platteforma de traductor automatic gratuite, open source, finalisate initialmente a pares de linguas relative, como CA, ES, GA, PT, OC e FR ma in le ultime tempore expandite pro tractar con plus pares de linguas divergente (assi como anglese-catalano).
<u0>Belazar</u0> is a Machine language translation tool for the Russian-Belarusian language pair.
<u0>Belazar</u0> es un application pro le traduction automatic pro le par del lingua russo-bielorusso.

<u0>LanguageTool</u0> is an Open Source style and grammar proofreading software for English, French, German, Polish, Dutch, Romanian, and a number of other languages - see the <u1>list of supported languages</u1>.

<u0>LanguageTool</u0> es un software open source, corrector de stilo e grammatica pro anglese, francese, germano, polaco, nederlandese, romaniano, e plure altere linguas - vide le <u1>lista del linguas supportate</u1>.
<u0>Microsoft Terminology Collection</u0> <i1/> can be downloaded in nearly 100 languages and can serve as a cornerstone IT glossary.
On pote discargar le <u0>Collection de terminologia Microsoft</u0> <i1/> in quasi 100 linguas e pote servir como glossario, petra angular del technologia informatic (IT).
<u1>Microsoft Terminology Collection</u1> <i2/> can be downloaded in nearly 100 languages and can serve as a cornerstone IT glossary.
On pote discargar le <u1>Collection de terminologia Microsoft</u1> <i2/> in quasi 100 linguas e can servir como glossario petra angular del technologia informatic (IT).

A "Modified Version" of the Document means any work containing the Document or a portion of it, either copied verbatim, or with modifications and/or translated into another language.
A "Modified Version" of the Document means any work containing the Document or a portion of it, either copied verbatim, or with modifications and/or translated into another language.

A "Secondary Section" is a named appendix or a front-matter section of the Document that deals exclusively with the relationship of the publishers or authors of the Document to the Document's overall subject (or to related matters) and contains nothing that could fall directly within that overall subject.

A "Transparent" copy of the Document means a machine-readable copy, represented in a format whose specification is available to the general public, that is suitable for revising the document straightforwardly with generic text editors or (for images composed of pixels) generic paint programs or (for drawings) some widely available drawing editor, and that is suitable for input to text formatters or for automatic translation to a variety of formats suitable for input to text formatters.

A "covered work" means either the unmodified Program or a work based
A "project" is usually synonymous with a translation job.
Un "projecto" es de costume synonyme de un labor de traduction.
A "scanned" PDF file is a file in which the PDF format merely serves as a convenient container for scans of hardcopy pages.
Un file PDF "scandite" es un file in le qual le formato PDF servi solmente como un recipiente commode pro scansiones de paginas imprimite.
A "translated" External View file is produced by entering the translation in the target column.
Un file Vista Externe "rendite" es producite scribente le traduction in le columna de destination.
A 'deck' is a group of cards.
Un 'fasce' es un gruppo de cartas.
A <a0>HowTo describing the tokenizers plug-in</a0> is also available.
Il es disponibile anque un <a0>Guida que describe le plugin tokenizers</a0>.

A CAT tool, as the term is generally used by translators, refers to a software program that creates a "translation memory" (TM) of a translated document, which can then be used to facilitate the translation of future documents that have significant similarity to the first.

Un application CAT, como le termino es generalmente utilisate ab le traductores, se refere a un programma que crea, ex un documento rendite, un "memoria de traduction" (TM) que pote deinde servir pro facilitar le traduction de futur documentos con significative similaritate con le prime textos.
A European Commission press release (in .odt format) in OmegaT and below it the instantaneous target text displayed in Opera.
Un edition de pressa del Commission Europee (in formato .odt) in OmegaT e in sequito a illo le instantanee texto final monstrate in Opera.
A Front-Cover Text may be at most 5 words, and a Back-Cover Text may be at most 25 words.
A Front-Cover Text may be at most 5 words, and a Back-Cover Text may be at most 25 words.
A batch file, used to launch <a0>OmegaT</a0> from the Windows command line.
Un file batch, usate pro lancear <a0>OmegaT</a0> a partir del linea de commando de Windows.

Un character in le bloco grec (simplice <u0> bloco</u0>)

Un fenestra de linea de commando es alsi referite como "fenestra terminal".

A dialog opens, allowing you to enter the source term, target term and any comments you may have:
Se displica un fenestra de dialogo, que permitte te de inscriber le termino fonte, le termino de destination e omne le commentos que tu vole:

Un cifra: [0-9]
A few simple examples
Alicun exemplos simplice
A file might have no matching entries, so it will show empty.
Un file pote haber nulle entratas concordante, assi illo monstrara se vacue.
A fixed penalty of 5 is added if the removed part does not match some other segment, so the match does not show up as 100%
Un penalitate fixe de 5 es addite si le parte removite non concorda alicun altere segmento, assi le concordantia non non monstra fin a 100%
A general observation: "compatibility" is rarely a black and white, "yes" or "no" issue.
Un observation general: le "compatibilitate" es rarmente un question nigre e blanc, "si" o "no".
A given source segment may require several different translations, depending on the context.
Un date segmento fonte pote requirer plure traductiones differente, dependente del contexto.

Alias, in le Fenestra de Modifica, selige un parola o phrase in le campo de modifica (texto de destination del segmento currente) e pulsa <k4> <k5>Ctrl</k5> <k6>F</k6> </k4>.u

Alternatively, to avoid this issue you can set a private SVN server, for example if you already have an Apache server that includes the software in question (e.g. VisualSVN).
Alias, pro evitar iste question tu pote preparar un server SVN private, per exemplo si tu ja ha un server Apache que include le software in question (per exemplo VisualSVN).

Alternativemente, tu pote renominar

Alternatively:

Alternatives include a Linux .tar package, a Windows installer – with or without a Java Runtime Environment –, a Mac OS X installer, and a source code package for developers.
Le alternativas comprende un pacchetto .tar Linux, un installator Windows – con o sin un Java Runtime Environment (JRE) –, un installator Mac OS X, e un pacchetto codice fonte pro le disveloppatores.

Ben que Infix sia un application Windows, Iceni ha facite effortios pro provider al usatores de Linux e Macintosh.

Ben que sia discutibile si le resultatos de iste procedura essera comparabile a re arrangiar le traduction con un DTP professional, illos essera probabilemente multo melio que le conversion a formatos completemente differente (assi como RTF).

Although it might seem strange to want to translate TMX files (the usual reason for creating a file filter), the addition of a TMX filter has the interesting effect that it enables TMX files in any location to be searched for from within any OmegaT project using the "Search Files" function, something not possible in the standard OmegaT build.

Ben que on poterea parer singular voler traducer le files TMX (le ration consuete pro crear un filtro de file), le addition de un filtro TMX ha Le interessante effecto que illo habilita le files TMX in omne location e esser cercate ab intra omne projecto OmegaT usante le function "Cerca files", alique non possibile in le compilation OmegaT standard.

Etiam si multe usatores es al currente de isto, lor reaction is frequentemente "Ma io non pote programmar!".

Apertium uses a shallow-transfer machine translation engine which processes the input text in stages, as in an assembly line: de-formatting, morphological analysis, part-of-speech disambiguation, shallow structural transfer, lexical transfer, morphological generation, and re-formatting.

Apertium usa un machina automatic a traduction superficial le qual processa le texto fonte in stages, como in un linea de montage: de-formattation, analyse morphologic, disambiguation del parte del discurso, traduction structural superficial, traduction lexical, generation morphologic, e re-formattation.

As <a0>OmegaT</a0> handles identical segments as one single entity, only the first unique segment is shown.
A mesura que <a0>OmegaT</a0> tracta segmentos identic como un entitate singule, sol le prime segmento unic es monstrate.
As I say any biotechnology guy could make a poisonous food, it is easy: there are more poisonous plants in the world and there are non-poisonous ones:
Como io dice cata biotechnologia garson poterea facer un alimento venenose, il es facile: il ha plus plantas venenose in le mundo e il ha unos non venenose:
As a general rule for the purpose of this tutorial, assume that if something is visible in your browser, it should be translated.<br0/>
Como regula general pro le fin de iste parve instruction, presume que si alicun cosa es visibile in tu lector del tela, illo deberea esser rendite.<br0/>
As a result of this, all settings will be at their defaults, due to which you may experience unexpected, but correct behaviour.
Ergo, omne preparationes essera al lor preparation initial e tu pote haber experientia de un comportamento inopinate, ma correcte.
As already mentioned, a bash launch script is provided with OmegaT.
Como jam mentionate, un script de lanceamento bash es fornite con OmegaT.
As already mentioned, this problem with MS Office 2007 is not unique to OmegaT.
Como jam mentionate, iste problema con MS Office 2007 non es unic in OmegaT.
As an open-source application, OmegaT has been included by many Linux distributions in their repositories, so you may be able to install it by this route.
Como un application open-source, OmegaT esseva includite per multe distributiones Linux in lor depositos, assi tu pote esser capace a installar lo per iste via.
As customers/authors upgrade Microsoft Office/Word to more recent versions, translators can expect to receive files increasingly in the new format.
A mesura que le clientes e le autores promove Microsoft Office/Word al versiones plus recente, le traductores pote expectar se de reciper le files progressivemente in le nove formato.

As elsewhere in the OmegaT project, the work of programming OmegaT is done by volunteers, and in keeping with the project philosophy, the developments and improvements they make to OmegaT are ultimately at their discretion.

Como alterubi in le projecto OmegaT, le labor de programmation de OmegaT es facite con voluntarios, e in harmonia con la philosophia del projecto, le disveloppamentos e le meliorationes que illes face a OmegaT es finalmente a lor discretion.
As entries can mix words from priority and non priority glossaries, the words from the priority glossary are displayed in bold.
a mesura que le entratas pote miscer le parolas ex Glossarios con prioritate e sin prioritate, le parolas ex le glossario prioritari es monstrate in nigrato.

As far as categories are concerned, the de facto industry standard of classifying matches into the following groups is used: Repetitions, Exact match, 95%-100%, 85%-94%, 75%-84%, 50%-74% and No match.

Re quanto concerne le categorias, es usate le standard del industria re le classification del concordantias in le gruppos sequente: Repetitiones, Concorda exacte, 95%-100%, 85%-94%, 75%-84%, 50%-74% e Nulle concordantia.
As for te-basic-source, but for the target text.
Como pro te-basic-source, ma pro le texto de destination.
As for te-gloss-highlight, but substitutes the source terms in the glossary with the target terms.
Como pro te-gloss-highlight, ma substitue le terminos in le glossario con le terminos de destination.
As is so often the case with things technical (and things translation), there are catches.
Cono es sovente in le caso con cosas technic (e cosas re le traduction), il ha alicun trappas.
As its name suggests, it is an XML-based format.
Como su nomine suggere, illo es un formato basate sur XML.
As its name suggests, this script automatically strips the tags out of an OmegaT (target) segment.
Como su nomine suggere, iste script spolia del tags le segmento (final) de OmegaT.
As of December 2011, Google has required payment from users for use of this service.
A mesura que de decembre 2011, Google ha requirite le pagamento ab usatores pro uso de iste servicio.
As of version 2.1.8, by default, these multiple tags are now aggregated (condensed) into a single tag.
As of version 2.1.8, by default, these multiple tags are now aggregated (condensed) into a single tag.

As opposed to user-generated translation memories (as in the case of <a0>OmegaT</a0>) Machine translation (MT) tools use rule-based linguistic tools to create a translation of the source segment without the need for a translation memory.

Al contrario del memorias de traduction generate per le usator (como in le caso de <a0>OmegaT</a0>) le applicationes de Traduction Automatic usa instrumentos linguistic basate sur regulas pro crear un traduction del segmento fonte sin le necessitate de un memoria de traduction.
As stated above, OmegaT tags are LTR strings.
Como constatate precedentemente, le tags OmegaT son lineas LTR.
As such, it does nothing not already done by the OmegaT Editor pane; its purpose is to illustrate how the text can be extracted from a script file and made available for further scripts.
Como tal, il face nihil non ja facite per le quadro Modifica de OmegaT; su fin es illustrar como le texto pote esser extrahite ex un file script e rendite disponibile pro scripts ulterior.
As the existing content will not be touched, damage to an existing file would be limited.
Pois que le contento existente non essera alterate, eventual damnos a un file existente deberea esser limitate.

As the program is intended for translators throughout the world and not just in English-speaking countries, it is appropriate that the documentation (and, if possible, the program itself) be available in other languages.

Pois que le programma es destinate pro le traductores in omne le mundo e non solmente in le paises de lingua anglese, il es opportun que la documentation e, si possibile, le programma mesme, sia disponibile in altere linguas.
As this is the standard behavior for PO files, it is on by default.
Pois que isto es le comportamento standard pro le files PO, isto is active per arrangiamento initial.
As with free developments, however, the principle still applies that any changes to OmegaT must be beneficial to the application and its users.
Como con le disveloppamentos gratuite, tamen se applica ancora le principio que omne cambios a OmegaT debe esser benefic al application e a su usatores.
As with the glossary function, you can use keyboard shortcuts to copy and paste content from the Text Search window into the active translation segment.
Como con le function glossario, tu pote usar le vias breve ab le claviero pro copiar e collar le contento ab le fenestra Cerca Texto in le segmento de traduction active.
As you translate your files, <a0>OmegaT</a0> stores your work continually in <f1>project_save.tmx</f1> in the project's /<f2>omegat</f2> subfolder.
Quando tu rende tu files, <a0>OmegaT</a0> registra tu labor a omne instante in <f1>project_save.tmx</f1> in le sub plica del projecto /<f2>omegat</f2>.
As you translate your files, <a0>OmegaT</a0> stores your work continually in <f1>project_save.tmx</f1> in the project's /<f2>omegat</f2> subfolders.
Quando tu rende tu files, <a0>OmegaT</a0> registra tu labor a omne instante in <f1>project_save.tmx</f1> in le sub plica del projecto /<f2>omegat</f2>.

At each cursor position rules, consisting of a <e0>Before </e0>and <e1>After </e1>pattern, are applied in their given order to see if any of the<e2> Before</e2> patterns are valid for the text on the left and the corresponding <e3>After</e3> pattern for the text on the right of the cursor.

A cata position del cursor, le regulas, consistente de un modello <e0>Ante </e0>e <e1>Post </e1>, son applicate in lor ordine date pro vider si alicun del modellos<e2> Ante</e2> es valide pro le texto sur le sinistra e le correspondente modello <e3>Post</e3> pro le texto al dextra del cursor.

Actualmente, le data exportate es:
At the beginning of the installation you can select the language to be used during the installation.
Al initio del installation tu pote seliger le lingua a utilisar per le installation.
At the bottom of the dialog next to Keyboard shortcuts, click on Customize.
Al base del fenestra de dialogo juxta a Vias breve de claviero, clicca sur Personalisa.
At the end of your translation, OmegaT exports three translation memories called "level1", "level2" and "omegat" to your project folder.
Al fin de tu traduction, OmegaT exporta tres memorias de traduction appellate "level1", "level2" e "omegat" in tu classificator del projecto.
At the end of your translation, OmegaT exports three translation memories called <f0>level1</f0>, <f1>level2</f1> and <f2>omegat</f2> to your project folder.
Al fin de tu traduction, OmegaT exporta in le plica de tu projecto tres memorias de traduction, cata denominate: <f0>level1</f0>, <f1>level2</f1>e <f2>omegat</f2>.
At the present time, this includes all versions of Microsoft Windows from Windows 98 onwards, Mac OS X, and most Linux distributions.
Actualmente, istos include tote le versiones de Microsoft Windows partir de Windows 98 in avante, Mac OS X, e le major parte del distributiones de Linux.

By default, left justification is used for Left-To-Right (LTR) languages and right justification for Right-To-Left (RTL) languages.

Per arrangiamento prefixate initial, le justification sinistre es usate pro le linguas ab Sinistra a Dextera (Left-To-Right - LTR) e le justification dextre pro le linguas ab Dextera a Sinistra (Right-To-Left - RTL).

By default, the Go To Next Untranslated Segment command (Ctrl+U) skips to the next untranslated segment, skipping propagated translations in the process.

By default, the bash launch script is executable, but your system may change its permissions (e.g. during unpacking of the archive) and you may have to make it executable again.

By default, the source text is pasted into the target text segment for you.
Per le arrangiamento base initial, le texto primari es collate pro te in le campo de modifica del segmento final.
By default, the translated file encoding is the same as the source file encoding.
Per arrangiamento base, le codification del file rendite es identic al codification del file fonte.

Marcar <e2>TMs</e2> pro includer in le recerca le memorias de traduction ubicate in le plica <f3>tm</f3>.
Check <e4>Glossaries</e4> to include the glossaries located in the <f5>glossary</f5> folder in the search.
Marcar <e4>Glossarios</e4> pro includer in le recerca le glossarios ubicate in le plica <f5>glossary</f5>.
Check Google Translate v2 (leaving the other options unchecked)
Marca Google Translate v2 (lassante non marcate le altere optiones)
Check Rules
Regulas de Controlo
Check for doubled blanks
Controla pro le Spatios blanc duplicate
Check for doubled words
Controla pro le parolas duplicate
Check for equal source & target
Controla pro le fonte & destination equal
Check for inconsistent numbers
Controla pro le numeros inconsistente
Check for leading whitespace
Controla pro le Spatio blanc initial
Check for longer target
Controla pro le destination plus longe
Check for possible Tag errors with <k0>Ctrl+T </k0>and untranslated segments with <k1>Ctrl+U</k1>.
Controla pro eventual errores de Tag con <k0>Ctrl+T </k0>e segmentos non rendite con <k1>Ctrl+U</k1>.
Check for segments with spelling errors
Controla pro le segmentos con errores orthographic
Check for shorter target
Controla pro le destination plus curte
Check for trailing whitespace
Controla pro le Spatio blanc final
Check for untranslated segments
Controla pro le segmentos non rendite
Check however that the language codes are exactly the same: an FR-FR dictionary will not work with an FR target setting, for example.
Controla comocunque que le codices del lingua es exactemente le mesme: un dictionario FR-FR non laborara con un preparation pro la lingua final FR, per exemplo.
Check if the selected service offers it.
Controla que le Servicio seligite offere lo.
Check in <m0> <s1> <k2> <k3><i4/>Ctrl</k3> <k5>E</k5> </k2> </s1> <g6>Project</g6> <g7>Properties</g7> </m0>.
Controla in <m0> <s1> <k2> <k3><i4/>Ctrl</k3> <k5>E</k5> </k2> </s1> <g6>Projecto</g6> <g7>Proprietates</g7> </m0>.
Check in Options > File Filters that the new filter is present.
controla in 'Optiones > Filtros de file' que le nove filtro es presente.
Check in Options > Machine Translate, that Google Translate V2 is checked.
Controla in Optiones > Traduction Automatic, que Google Translate V2 es marcate.
Check number of tags
Controla le numero del tags
Check punctuation at segment end
Controla le punctuation al fin del segmento
Check sequence of tags
Controla le sequentia del tags
Check simple &java MessageFormat patterns (e.g. {0})
Controla le modellos MessageFormat &java simple (e.g. {0})
Check simple java MessageFormat patterns
Controla modellos simplice MessageFormat java
Check spaces around tags
Controla le spatios circa le tags
Check start case
Controla le Initial majuscula
Check that <u0>Translate API service </u0>has been activated.
Controla que le <u0>Servicio API de traduction </u0>esseva activate.
Check that spelling checking is enabled in the spelling checking dialog.
Controla que le controlo orthographic es habilitate in le fenestra de dialogo del controlo orthographic.
Check that the .dic and .aff files for your language are present in the spelling dictionary folder, and that their names correspond to the target language code.
Controla que le files .dic e .aff pro tu lingua es presente in le plica del dictionarios orthographic, e que lor nomines corresponde al codice del lingua de destination.
Check that you have write permissions for the spelling dictionary folder you have selected.
Controla que tu ha permissiones de scriber pro le plica del dictionarios orthographic que tu ha seligite.
Check that your dict files are in the correct folder (or in a subfolder below it).
Controla qual files dict ha in tu plica correcte (o in un sub plicas sub illo).
Check the <u0>OmegaT home page</u0> for an up-to-date listing of auxiliary translation tools.
Controla le <u0>pagina initial OmegaT</u0> pro un lista actual del applicationes auxiliar de traduction.
Check the changes to be made - i.e. the folders and files added in this case.
Controla le cambios a facer - id es le plicas e le files addite in iste caso.
Check the contents of the folder to confirm that the local copy of the repository and the corresponding files and folders correspond to the latest server version:
Controla le contentos del plica pro confirmar que le copia local del deposito e le files e plicas correspondente corresponde al ultime version del server:
Check the web site for the latest list of implemented language pairs.
Controla le sito TTT pro le ultime lista del pares de linguas implementate.
Check this option to be warned about differences between source and target segments tags each time you leave a segment.
Marca iste option pro esser avertite re le differentias inter le tags del segmentos fonte e los de destination cata vice tu lassa un segmento.

Check this option to record in the <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> file the information that a segment has been auto-populated, so it can be displayed with a specific color in the Editor (if the "Mark Auto-Populated Segments" option, in the View menu, is checked).

Marca iste option pro registrar in le file <f0>project_save.tmx</f0> le informationes que un segmento ha essite auto-populate, si que illo pote esser monstrate con un color specific in le quadro de Modifica (si le option "Marca le Segmentos Auto-Populate", in le menu Vide... , es marcate).
Check whole project
Controla le projecto integre
Checking out the project...
controlo del projecto...
Checking your translation
Controlo del traduction
Checks for language errors (style, grammar, etc.).
Controla pro errores del lingua (stilo, grammatica, etc.).
Chichewa, Chewa, Nyanja
Chichewa, Chewa, Nyanja
Chinese
Chinese
Chinese cards, including Hanzi cards, will be shown.
le cartas Chinese, includente le cartas Hanzi, essera monstrate.
Choose Macros from the drop-down list.
Opta Macros ab le lista a cadita.
Choose SVN repository to perform cleanup
Selige le deposito SVN deposito pro effectuar le Reparation
Choose<g0> SVN.</g0>
Eliger le<g0> SVN.</g0>

Reparation facite!!
Clear
Clara
Clic on <g0>Exclusions...</g0> to define the files or folders that will be ignored by <a1>OmegaT</a1>.
Cliccar sur <g0>Exclusiones...</g0> pro definir le files o plicas que essera ignorate per <a1>OmegaT</a1>.
Click 'Add' in the main window, and the Add
Clicca 'Add' in le fenestra principal, e
Click <e0>Defaults</e0> to reset the file filters to the default settings.
Clicca <e0>preparationes base </e0> pro prefixar le filtros de file al preparationes base.
Click <e2>Replace Next</e2> or <e3>Skip</e3>, then end the replacement session with <e4>Finish</e4>.
Cliccar <e2>Replacia le sequente</e2> o <e3>Salta</e3>, pois finir le session de replaciamento con<e4>Fini</e4>.
Click <g0>Create Project</g0>
Clicca <g0>Crea Projecto</g0>
Click Customize > Choose commands.
Clicca Personalisa > Selige le commandos.
Click Popular in the Word Options dialog box.
Clicca Popular in le cassa de dialogo Optiones de Word.
Click and drag the newly created .odt file to the <f0>/source</f0><f1> folder of your </f1><f2>My Project-1</f2><f3> folder, which you created in Step </f3><f4>6</f4><f5>.</f5>
Clicca e trahe le nove file .odt create in le plica <f0>/source</f0><f1> de tu plica </f1><f2>My Project-1</f2><f3>, que tu creava in le passo </f3><f4>6</f4><f5>.</f5>
Click in the box for a new keyboard combination, then experiment with keyboard combinations to find one that is not assigned.
Clicca in le cassa pro un nove combination de claviero, pois experimenta con le combinationes de claviero pro trovar uno que non es assignate.
Click on "Segmentation" to call up the Segmentation Setup dialog.
Clicca sur "Segmentation" pro advocar le fenestra de dialogo: "Preparation del segmentation del projecto".
Click on '{0}' menu item
Clicca sur le item '{0}' del menu
Click on <g0>Auto-text...</g0> to configure Auto-text options and to add or remove entries.
Cliccar sur <g0>Auto-texto...</g0> pro configurar le optiones de Auto-texto e adder o remover entratas.
Click on <g0>Character Table...</g0> to set the Character table auto-completer options.
Cliccar sur <g0>Tabella del Character...</g0> pro poner le optiones del auto-completator del tabella del Character.
Click on <g0>Glossary...</g0> to configure the Auto-completer Glossary View.
Cliccar sur <g0>Glossario...</g0> pro configurar le Vista del Glossario Auto-completator.
Click on <g1>Copy Files to Source Folder...</g1> to select your source files.
Cliccar sur <g1>Copia Files al Plica Fonte...</g1> pro seliger tu files a render.
Click on <g1>File Filters</g1> button and activate the check box <g2>Enable project specific filters</g2><i3/>.
Clicca sur le button <g1>Filtros de File</g1> e activa le quadrato de controlo <g2>Habilita filtros specific del projecto</g2><i3/>.
Click on Add.
Clicca sur Adde.
Click on Assign to assign the shortcut to the macro that you are about to record.
Clicca sur Assigna pro assignar le via breve al macro que tu es circa registrar.
Click on Macros and select levelformat (or whatever name you gave to your macro), then Edit.
Clicca sur Macros e selige "levelformat" (o qual que sia tu ha lo nominate), pois Modifica.
Click on Modify.
Clicca sur Modifica.
Click on the Keyboard button.
Clicca sur le button Claviero.
Click on the icon button (to the right of the Name/Description/Comment fields)
Clicca sur le button icone (al derecta del campos Nomine, Description o Commento)
Click on the icon button, then hit <e0>Browse...</e0> and navigate to the /images subfolder in the <a1>OmegaT</a1> application folder.
Clicca sur le button icone, pois pulsa <e0>Naviga...</e0> al sub plica /images in le plica del application <a1>OmegaT</a1>.
Click on the link to activate the segment in the Editor.
Clicca sur le ligamine pro activar le segmento in le Editor.
Click on the link to jump to the segment in the Editor pane.
Clicca sur le ligamine pro saltar al segmento in le quadro del Modifica.
Click on the one or ones you want and click Install again, then close the box.
Clicca sur illos que tu vole e de nove clicca "Installa", dunque claude le cassa.
Click on the paragraph mark button to make paragraph marks visible.
Clicca sur le button marca paragrapho pro render le marcas del paragrapho visibile.
Click the Import source files... to select your source file.
Cliccar le Importa files primari... pro seliger tu archivos fonte.
Click the dropdown arrow of the <e0>Search for</e0> box to access the last 10 searches.
Cliccar le flecha a cadita del cassa <e0>Recercar pro</e0> al fin de acceder al ultime 10 recerca.
Click “Install” and you will be given a list of many possible dictionaries (<f7>b</f7><f8>)</f8>.
Clicca “Installa” e tu habera un lista de multe possibile dictionarios (<f7>b</f7><f8>)</f8>.
Clicking <g0>Tools > </g0><g1>Scripting</g1> opens the Scripting window:<s2> <s3>Scripting window</s3> <m4> <i5> <i6/> </i5> </m4> </s2>
Cliccar sur <g0>Instrumentos > </g0><g1>Scripting</g1> pro displicar the fenestra de dialogo de Scripting:<s2> <s3>Fenestra de dialogo Scripting</s3> <m4> <i5> <i6/> </i5> </m4> </s2>
Clicking <g3>Scripting</g3> opens the Scripting dialog:<s4> <s5>Scripting dialog</s5> <m6> <i7> <i8/> </i7> </m6> </s4>
Cliccar sur <g3>Scripting</g3> pro displicar the fenestra de dialogo de Scripting:<s4> <s5>Fenestra de dialogo Scripting</s5> <m6> <i7> <i8/> </i7> </m6> </s4>
Clicking on <g0>Install new dictionary</g0> button will open the Dictionary installer window, where you can select the dictionaries you want to install.
Cliccar sur le button <g0>Installa un nove dictionario</g0>, aperira le fenestra installator de Dictionario, ubi tu pote seliger le dictionarios que tu vole installar.
Clicking on a link as you would do in a web browser brings the desired page to the front.
Le cliccar sur un ligamine, ut tu facerea in un lector de TTT, porta avante le pagina desiderate.
Clicking on a segment opens it in the Editor for modifications.
Cliccar sur un segmento aperi lo in le quadro de Modifica pro le modificationes.
Clicking on any file will open it for translation
Cliccar sur omne file aperira lo pro le traduction
Clicking on any file will open it for translation.
Cliccar sur qualcunque file aperira lo pro le traduction
Clicking on one will save the current project, close it and open the other project.
Cliccar sur un salvara le projecto currente, claudera lo e aperira le altere projecto.
Clicking on the text in question will display a text box and formatting marks.
Cliccar sur le texto in question displicara un cassa pro texto e marcas de formato.

Clauder le instantia currente de OmegaT 3.

However, OmegaT does not fully support imported level 2 tmx files (these store not only the translation, but also the formatting).

However, OpenOffice.org facilitates the use of OmegaT (for example, as stated above, by making it easier to handle Microsoft Office files), and provides further </f1><f2>functions useful to translators and unrelated to OmegaT, such as the function </f2><t3/><f4>for creation of PDF files.

Comocunque, OpenOffice.org facilita le uso de OmegaT (per exemplo, como constatate supra, con le facilitar a manear le files de Microsoft Office), e forni additional </f1><f2>functiones utile pro le traductores e non connexe con OmegaT, assi como le function </f2><t3/><f4>pro le creation de files PDF.

Iceni Infix also enables you to save PDF files in RTF format, but in this case the demonstration version really is only suitable for demonstration purposes, as it contains random character substitutions.

Iceni Infix alsi habilita te a salvar le files PDF in formato RTF, ma in iste caso le version de demonstration vermente es convenibile sol pro fines demonstrative, pois que illo contine substitutiones casual de character.
Iceni Infix offers a further option.

Ideally, a viewer should do two things:
Idealmente, un visor preliminar deberea facer duo cosas:
Identifier used for alternative translations
Identificator usate pro traductiones alternative
Identify the .tmx file and the glossary (.txt) file for your language combination.
Identifica le file .tmx e le file glossario (.txt) pro tu combination de linguas.
Identify the paragraph-level tag(s) for your new file format.
Identifica le tag(s) a nivello de paragrapho pro tu nove formato de file.

If <l0>abort </l0>is selected, the tag validator will stop on the first invalid segment.
Si es seligite <l0>abort </l0>, le validator de tag arrestara se sur le prime segmento invalide.
If <l1>warn</l1> is specified, the tag validator will process all segments and write warnings about any segments with invalid tags into the file specified.
Si es specificate <l1>warn</l1>, le validator del tag processara omne le segmentos e scribera advertimentos re omne segmentos con tags invalide in le file specificate.
If HTML file has the encoding declaration, it will be used disregarding any value you set in this dialog.
Si un file HTML contine un declaration de codification, isto essera usate in vice de qualcunque valor que tu attribue in iste dialogo.
If Java is already installed on your system (which is probably the case) and you plan to use this existing, system-wide Java installation in conjunction with OmegaT, first check that it is suitable.

Si Java es jam installate sur tu systema (le qual es probabilemente le caso) e tu projecta usar iste existente installation Java de systema in conjunction con OmegaT, in prime loco controla que illo es convenibile.
If Java is installed at system level and is in the command path, the full
Si Java es installate a nivello de systema e es in le via del commando,

If Options > Editing Behaviour > "Go To Next Untranslated Segment stops when there is at least one alternative translation" is selected however and at least one alternative translation of a non-unique segment has been created, this function treats all instances of that segment (whether default or alternative translations) as untranslated, i.e. does not skip them.

Si Optiones > Comportamento del modifica > "Vade al sequente segmento non rendite arresta quando il ha is al minus un translation alternative" es seligite totevia e al minus un traduction alternative de un segmento non unic esseva create, iste function tracta omne occurrentias de un segmento (sia traductiones base o alternative) ut non rendite, id es non salta los.
If Priorview fails to launch:
Si Priorview falle al lanceamento:
If a "command not found" or similar message is returned, it is likely that Java is not installed on your system
Si es rendite un message "command not found" o simile, il es verisimile que Java non es installate sur tu systema
If a HHC or HHK file has an encoding declaration, it will be used regardless of any value you specify in this dialog.
Si un file HHC e HHK contine un declaration de codification, isto essera usate in vice de qualcunque valor que tu attribue in iste dialogo.
If a combination you try is already assigned, a message to this effect is displayed in the dialogue, and you can delete the combination and try another.
Si un combination que tu tenta es jam assignate, es monstrate un message pro iste effecto in the dialogo, e tu pote deler le combination e experir un altere.
If a file does not load into the <g0>Editor</g0> pane, then it could be that it is in a format that doesn't work in OmegaT.
Si un file non carga in le quadro <g0>Modifica</g0>, alora es possibile que tu file fonte ha un formato que non functiona in OmegaT.
If a file does not loads into the Editor pane, then it could be that your source file is in a format that doesn't work in OmegaT.
Si un file non carga in le quadro 'Editor', alora es possibile que tu file primari ha un formato que non functiona in OmegaT.
If a given sentence has already been translated once, and translated correctly, there is no need for it to be retranslated.
Si un phrase date esseva jam rendite un vece, e rendite correctemente, il non ha necessitate pro retraducer lo.
If a license document contains
If a license document contains
If a search removes duplicates, those duplicates will not be in the Editor.
Si un recerca elimina le duplicatos, ille duplicatos non essera in le Editor.
If a section does not fit the above definition of Secondary then it is not allowed to be designated as Invariant.
If a section does not fit the above definition of Secondary then it is not allowed to be designated as Invariant.

If a section in the Document is Entitled "Acknowledgements," "Dedications," or "History," the requirement (section 4) to Preserve its Title (section 1) will typically require changing the actual title.

If a section in the Document is Entitled "Acknowledgements," "Dedications," or "History," the requirement (section 4) to Preserve its Title (section 1) will typically require changing the actual title.
If a segment has already been translated and an identical segment later on in the text is then changed, the earlier segment will be brought into line with the changed segment.
Si un segmento esseva ja rendite e un segmento identic plus tarde sur in le texto es alora cambiate, le segmento anterior essera re portate in linea con le segmento cambiate.
If a user interface in this language is available, <a3>OmegaT</a3> uses it.
Si es disponibile un Interfacie del Usator in iste lingua, <a3>OmegaT</a3> usara lo.
If additional permissions
If additional permissions

If after looking at the fuzzy match you decide that it is useful, you can paste it into the active segment at any point (Ctrl+I), or replace (overwrite) the active segment with it completely (Ctrl+R) and then modify it, or copy and paste parts of it into the active segment (use the mouse to mark it, then Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V to copy and paste).

Si postquam ha querite al concordantia partial tu decide que illo es utile, tu pote lo collar in le segmento active in qualcunque puncto (Ctrl+I), o reimplaciar (super scriber) completemente le segmento active con illo (Ctrl+R) e deinde lo modificar, o copiar e collar partes de illo in le segmento active (usa le mouse pro lo marcar, deinde Ctrl+C e Ctrl+V pro lo copiar e collar).
If all has gone according to plan, your macro should now work.
Si toto esseva facite secun le plano, tu macro deberea ora functionar.
If all is well, an .html version of the file will be produced:<br1/>
Si tote es ben, un version .html del file essera producite:<br1/>
If an <a0>OmegaT</a0> project contains one or more glossaries, any terms in the glossary which are also found in the current segment will be automatically displayed in the Glossary viewer.
Si un projecto <a0>OmegaT</a0> contine uno o plus glossarios, qualcunque terminos in le glossario que alsi es trovate in le actual segmento essera automaticamente monstrate in le quadro "Glossario".
If an Internet connection is available, various MT services such as Google Translate and Microsoft Translator can be used from within OmegaT.
Si es disponibile un connexion al rete, on pote usar per OmegaT, varie servicios de traduction automatic qual Apertium, Google Translate, e Microsoft Translator.
If an error is found in such a file, OmegaT will indicate the position within the defective file at which the error is located.
Si es trovate un error in tal fila, OmegaT marcara le position, intra le file defective, ubi es localisate le error.

If any portion of this section is held invalid or unenforceable under
If checked, non-breakable spaces in the segment will be displayed with a grey background.
Si activate, le spatios non non-frangibile in le segmento essera monstrate con un fundo gris.
If checked, non-breakable spaces will be displayed with a grey background.
Si activate, le spatios non non-frangibile essera monstrate con un fundo gris.
If checked, non-unique segments will be marked in pale grey.
Si activate, le segmentos non unic essera marcate in gris pallide.
If checked, segments with notes will be marked in cyan.
Si activate, le segmentos con notas essera marcate in cyano.
If checked, source segments will be shown and marked in green.
Si activate, le segmentos fonte essera monstrate e marcate in verde.
If checked, the background of all segments where the target segment has been auto-populated (from TMXs placed in /tm/auto for example) are displayed in colour.
Si marcate, le fundo de omne le segmentos ubi le segmento de destination ha essite auto-populate (per exemplo per TMXs ubicate in le plica /tm/auto) es monstrate in color.
If checked, the entries are sorted alphabetically.
Si marcate, le entratas son ordinate alphabeticamente.
If checked, the longer entries are placed on the list first.
Si marcate, le entratas plus longe son ubicate sur le prime lista.
If checked, the translated segments will be marked in yellow.
Si iste option es activate, le segmentos rendite essera marcate in jalne.
If checked, the untranslated segments will be marked in violet.
Si activate, le segmentos non rendite essera marcate in violetto.
If checked, white spaces will be displayed with a small dot.
Si activate, le spatios blanc essera monstrate con un parve puncto.

If distribution of executable or object code is made by offering

If every single word in OmegaT is enclosed within tags, it is possible that Word has attempted to spell-check the text without access to a suitable spelling dictionary, and has therefore marked each word as mis-spelt.

Si cata singule parola in OmegaT es includite inter tags, il es possibile que Word ha tentate le controlo orthographic del texto sin accesso a un convenibile dictionario orthographic, e ha ergo marcate cata parola ut error orthographic.

If for a given source segment there is as yet no existing translation in the project translation memory (project_save.tmx), the current translation will be saved in the project_save.tmx as the default translation.

Si pro un segmento fonte date Il non ha adhuc traduction existente in le memoria de traduction del projecto (project_save.tmx), le traduction actual essera salvate in le file project_save.tmx quam traduction base.
If for a given source segment there is no entry for the selected target language, all other target segments are loaded, regardless of the language.
Si pro un date segmento fonte il ha nulle entrata pro le lingua de destination seligite, omne altere segmentos destination son cargate, sin reguardo del lingua.
If for example the original file is named Document.xx.docx, the following variables will give the following results:
Si per exemplo le file original es denominate Document.xx.docx, le variabiles sequente dara le resultatos sequente:
If for some reason these files are lost or corrupted, simply download and/or reinstall OmegaT to restore them all.
Si pro qualque ration iste files son perdite o corrupte, discarga vel reinstalla simplemente OmegaT pro restaurar illos tote.
If given, <a2>OmegaT</a2> launches in console mode and translates the given project.
Si date, <a2>OmegaT</a2> lancea in modo consola e traduce le projecto date.
If given, <a2>OmegaT</a2> starts in console mode and will translate the given project.
Si date, <a2>OmegaT</a2> initia in modo consola e traducera le projecto date.
If in doubt, don't hesitate to ask project members directly either by sending them an e-mail from the SourceForge page or by sending a public mail to the user group.
If in doubt, don't hesitate to ask project members directly either by sending them an e-mail from the SourceForge page or by sending a public mail to the user group.

If it does not, you still have the option to install a local version of Java or a different version of Java at system level.
si non opera, tu ancora ha le option pro installar un version local de Java o un differente version de Java a nivello de systema.
If it fails that it won't make any GMO look good,
Si illo falle que illo won't facer ulle GMO quere bon,
If it is <e0>tar.bz</e0>, you have forgotten to unpack (untar) it.
Si illo es <e0>tar.bz</e0>, tu ha oblidate a discassar (untar) lo.
If it is clear from the very start, that translations in a given TM (or TMs) are all correct, one can put them into the<e0> tm/auto</e0> folder and avoid confirming a lot of<e1> [fuzzy]</e1> cases.
Si illo es clar a partir del initio, que le traductiones in certe TMs es omne correcte, on pote mitter los in le plica <e0> tm/auto</e0> e evitar de confirmar multe casos<e1> [fuzzy]</e1>.
If it is not in your distribution's repository, you can <a0>download it from kaptain.sourceforge.net</a0>.
If illo non es in tu deposito del distribution, tu pote <a0>discarga lo ex kaptain.sourceforge.net</a0>.
If languages match but not the country, the segments still get loaded.
Si le linguas concorda me non le pais, le segmentos ancora es cargate.
If later access to the desired location is granted that location will be used and all settings will return to their defaults as a result of the location change.
Si un ulterior accesso al location desiderate essera accordate, iste location essera usate e omne preparationes retornara al lor initio a causa del cambiamento de location.
If multiple functions were to be used at the same time in practice, it would be more efficient to combine them in a single script file.
Si multiple functiones debera esser usate al mesme tempore in practica, esserea plus efficiente combinar los in un file script singule.
If necessary, edit the file names of the dictionary or change your project's language settings.
Si necessari, edita le nomines del file del dictionario o cambia tu preparationes pro le lingua de tu projecto.
If neither the language code not the country code match, the segments will be ignored.
Si ni le codice lingua ni le codice pais concorda, le segmentos essera ignorate.
If no replacement is done to a given segment, the target segment will be “emptied”, i.e., it will remain untranslated.
Si le segmento de destination non ha essite replaciate, le destination essera “vacuate”, id es, illo remanera non rendite.
If no text has been selected, the current source segment is written to this file.
Si non era seligite nulle texto, le segmento fonte actual es scripte in iste file.
If no text is selected, <a1>OmegaT</a1> selects the word that contains the letter immediately to the right of the cursor.
Si nulle texto es seligite, <a1>OmegaT</a1> selige le parola que contine le littera immediatemente al derecta del cursor.
If not checked, source segments will not be shown.
Si non activate, le segmentos fonte non essera monstrate.
If not given, <a2>OmegaT</a2> reverts to default values (<a3>OmegaT</a3> folder under user home or, if unavailable, the current working folder).
Si non date, <a2>OmegaT</a2> reveni al plica del valores de preparation base (<a3>OmegaT</a3> sub home del usator o, si indisponibile, le plica de labor actual).
If not specified, OmegaT reverts to default values (the OmegaT folder in the user home folder, or if not available: the current working folder).
Si non specificate, OmegaT reveni al plica del valores prefixate initial (le plica OmegaT in le plica domo del usator o, si indisponibile: le plica de labor actual).
If not, debugging messages will be shown which will (hopefully) provide some idea of where the problem is.
Si non, essera monstrate messages de cernita que (on spera) providera alicun idea re ubi es le problema.
If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
If not, why not write an article on using OmegaT?
Si non, perque non scriber un articulo re le uso de OmegaT?
If not...
Si non...
If on, when a PO segment (which may be a whole paragraph) is not translated, the translation will be empty in the target file.
Si active, quando un segmento PO (le qual pote esser un paragrapho integre) non es rendite, le traduction essera vacue in le file de destination.
If one does not wish to use external TMs for counting, one will either have to empty the /tm folder or change the project setup (temporarily) so that the value for /tm points to a different location.

Si on non desidera usar TMs externe pro le computo, on habera o vacuar le plica /tm o cambiar le preparation del projecto (temporaneemente) de maniera que le valor pro /tm puncta a un position differente.
If only one file is present, check its extension.
Si es presente sol un file, controla su extension.
If part of the target segment has been selected, this function overwrites the selected portion.
Si esseva seligite parte del segmento, iste function superscribe le portion seligite.
If propagation of a covered
If propagation of a covered
If sentence segmentation has been selected, you can setup the rules by selecting <m5> <g6><i7/>Options</g6> <g8>Segmentation...</g8> </m5>from the main menu.
Si le segmentation per phrase esseva seligite, tu pote prefixar le regulas con <m5> <g6><i7/>Optiones</g6> <g8>Segmentation...</g8> </m5>del menu principal.
If so, this makes installation much easier.
Si assi, isto rende le installation multo plus facile.
If spell checking is activated, spelling mistakes and typos are recognized and can be corrected during translation.
Si es activate le controlo orthographic, le errores orthographic e le lapsus son identificate e marcate pro esser correcte durante le traduction.
If such problems arise substantially in other domains, we
If such problems arise substantially in other domains, we

If the

Si le quadrato de controlo Auto-propagation non es marcate, le segmentos con traductiones alternative son lassate non rendite dum le usator decide qual traduction ser usate.

Si le codice se compila con bon successo, tu videra le message "BUILD SUCCESSFUL".
If the current segment is the first one in a file, it moves to the last segment of the previous file.
Si le segmento currente es le ultime segmento in un file, illo move al prime segmento del file previe.
If the current segment is the last segment in a file, it moves to the first segment of the next file.
Si le segmento currente es le ultime segmento in un file, illo move al prime segmento del file successive.
If the current translation of the segment does not fit, the user can select <g0>Edit → Create Alternative Translation</g0>.
Si le traduction currente del segmento non conveni, le usator pote seliger <g0>Modifica → Crea Traduction Alternative</g0>.

Si le documento permitte, le traductor es fortemente incitate a remover le information del stilo ab le documento fonte assi que in le interfacie OmegaT appare tam pauc tags quam possibile.
If the file already exists, no attempt is done to verify the format or the character set of the file: the new entries will always be in tab-separated format and UTF-8.

Si le file existe jam, nulle tentativa es facite pro verificar le formato o le serie de character del file: le nove entratas essera semper in formato texto simple, 'separate per signo de tabulation' e codificate UTF-8.

If the filter has any options, you may change them by clicking Options.
Si Le filtro ha alicun optiones, tu pote mutar los cliccante Optiones.

Si le lingua del systema del usator non es disponibile, <a6>OmegaT</a6> adopta le preparationes base in anglese.

Si le option es disactivate, le texto fonte essera copiate al segmento destination.

If the parameter is not specified, all files will be processed.
Si le parametros non es specificate, omne files essera processate.

If the required texts for either cover are too voluminous to fit legibly, you should put the first ones listed (as many as fit reasonably) on the actual cover, and continue the rest onto adjacent pages.

If the required texts for either cover are too voluminous to fit legibly, you should put the first ones listed (as many as fit reasonably) on the actual cover, and continue the rest onto adjacent pages.

Si le corrector orthographic es non functionante, alora face secur in prime loco que le cassa de marca <g0>"Controla automaticamente le orthographia del texto"</g0> in le dialogo del corrector orthographic (<g1>Optiones > correction orthographic...)</g1> es marcate.

Si le valor es <l1>abort</l1>, alora sur errores tag le errores son imprimite e le programma arresta se.
If the value is <l2>warn</l2> then the errors are printed but OmegaT continues.
Si le valor es <l2>warn</l2> alora le errores son imprimite, ma OmegaT continua.

If you decide mid-translation to switch from sentence to paragraph translation, the internal translation memory of the project will not be changed (OmegaT may upgrade old translation memories that did not use sentence segmentation, but not vice versa), but OmegaT will attemps to create paragraph fuzzy matches by glueing together existing sentence translations.

Si tu decide in medio al traduction de cambiar de segmentation a phrase al segmentation a paragrapho, le memoria de traduction interne del projecto non essera cambiate (OmegaT pote promover vetule memorias de traduction que non usa segmentation a phrase, ma non vice versa), sed OmegaT tentara crear concordantia partial de paragrapho collante insimul traductiones de sententias existente.

If you have already translated a large body of text, and then realize the target language code of the project does not match the spell checker's language code (you specified pt_BR as the language, but there are no pt_BR vocabularies, for instance) you can simply copy the two corresponding files and rename them (e.g. from <e0>pt_PT.aff</e0> and <e1>pt_PT.dic</e1> to <e2>pt_BR.aff</e2> and <e3>pt_BR.dic</e3>).

Si tu ha jam rendite un grande corpore de texto, e alora realisa que le codice del lingua final del projecto non equala le codice del lingua del corrector orthographic (per exemplo tu ha specificate pt_BR como le lingua, ma non ha nulle vocabularios pt_BR) tu pote simplemente copiar le duo files correspondente e los renominar (e.g. ab <e0>pt_PT.arr</e0> e <e1>pt_PT.dic</e1> a <e2>pt._BR.arr</e2> e <e3>pt_BR.dic</e3>).

If you modify the project segmentation or delete files from the source, some matches may appear as <e1>orphan strings</e1> in the Match Viewer: such matches refer to segments that do not exist any more in the source documents, as they correspond to segments translated and recorded before the modifications took place.

Si tu modifica le segmentation del projecto o dele files in le fonte, alcun concordantias pote apparer como <e1>lineas de characteres orphane</e1> in le quadro del concordantia: tal concordantias refere a segmentos que non existe alicun plus in le documentos fonte, pois que illos corresponde a segmentos rendite e registrate ante que le modificationes habeva loco.

In case there are non-unique segments in source documents, the Auto-propagation check box offers the user the following two possibilities as regards automatic translation: if checked, the first translated segment will be assumed as the default translation and its target text will be automatically used for later hits during the translation process.

In caso il ha segmentos non unic in le documentos fonte, le quadrato de controlo del Auto-propagation offere al usator le duo possibilitates sequente respecto al traduction automatic: si marcate, le prime segmento rendite essera assumite como le traduction prefixate e su texto rendite essera usate automaticamente pro le occurrentias sequente durante le processo traduction.

Comocunque, In caso que le identic segmento fonte existe jam con un traduction differente, le nove traduction essera salvate como un alternativa.
In cases like these it becomes necessary to switch to RTL mode, so that the RTL (in fact bidirectional) text is displayed correctly.
In casos como istos deveni necessari commutar al modo RTL, de maniera que le texto RTL (de facto bidirectional) sia monstrate correctemente.

It is not worth getting bogged down with fine-tuning the segmentation rules at this stage; the basic rules as supplied should work adequately for demonstration purposes, even for a different (source) language, provided its sentence punctuation rules are broadly similar (i.e., don't use the Japanese segmentation rules if you are translating from Italian).

Illo non es avantagiose arenar se con le accordatura fin del regulas de segmentation in iste grado; le regulas basic que es supplite operara adequatemente pro le fines de demonstration, mesmo pro un lingua (de origine) differente, a condition que le regulas de punctuation del phrases esserea largemente simile (i.e., que tu non usa le regulas de segmentation japonese si tu va traducer ex italiano).

LB: And by what you are saying also, the number of GMO crops around the world right now is not small feet…, it’s relatively large,
LB: e per que tu es dicente alsi, le numero de recoltas GMO trans le mundo justo nunc non es parve feet…, il es relativemente grande,

LB: And there had been a release of radionuclides in the air anyway because of the first explosion, so I do agree with you, and by the way there is a very nice e-book, that was written the first days of Fukushima,

LB: e il habeva essite un emission de radionuclides in le aere in omne caso per le prime explosion, assi io concorda con te, e a proposito il ha un e-book multo bon, que esseva scribite le prime dies de Fukushima,
LB: And this point that you make is in fact very very relevant: just a few days ago Rod Adams, who is one of the biggest supporters of nuclear,
LB: E iste puncto que tu face es de vero assatis assatis relevante: justo ante alicun dies Rod Adams, qui es uno del plus grande supporteres del nuclear,
LB: And we had still people texting while driving, not knowing the consequences about doing that,
LB: e nos habeva adhuc gente que scribe SMS durante que guida, insciente del consequentias re facer isso,
LB: Can you give us a little introduction about where you come from and what was being leading you in this new position of a sensible environmentalist?
LB: Pote tu dar nos un parve prefacio re tu provenientia e quod induceva te in iste nove position de "Ambientalista rational"?
LB: Exactly!
LB: justo!
LB: Good evening, my name is Luca Bertagnolio, and tonight I am speaking on behalf of Atomi per la Pace.
LB: Bon vespere, mi nomine es Luca Bertagnolio, e iste nocte io va parlar in nomine de "Atomi per la Pace".

LB: I absolutely agree with you, although I have to say, back to your point about mingling between corporation and the state that cronyism is a matter of truth, I mean, there is a lot of cronyism, there is a lot of mingling between the state and large corporation: for instance you mentioned a number of times regulation and, somehow those regulation come in favour of one or another and, that's the typical aspect about one corporate get so large that they can somehow influence what happens... that's an unfortunate fact but it happens pretty much everyone on the planet.

LB: io concorda absolutemente con te, ben que io ha a dicer, retro a tu puncto re mingling inter le corporation e le stato ille cronyism es un affaire de veritate, io intende, il ha un quantitate de cronyism, il ha un quantitate de mingling inter le stato e le grande corporation: per exemplo tu ha mentionate plure vices le regulamento e, in alicun modo celle regulamento veni in favor de uno o un altere e, id es Le aspecto typic re un corporate devenite talmente grande que illes pote in alicun modo influentiar quod occurre... id es un facto infelice, sed illo occurre assatis multo ubique sur le planeta.
LB: I think that people in Greenland disagree...
LB: Io crede que le gente in Groenlandia disaccorda...
LB: In closing Patrick I wanted to ask you about a point going back to nuclear: I was wondering, thinking to myself, there is a lot of discussion in these days...
LB: In conclusion Patrick, io vole demandar te re un puncto, regressante al nuclear: io esseva meraviliante, opinante in me ipse, il ha un quantitate de discussion in iste dies...
LB: It was a pleasure, thank you so much.
LB: il esseva un agradamento, io regratia te tanto.
LB: Oh, they say the same about nuclear really, because it has always been large, large companies that have been building huge power plants
LB: Oh, illes dice le mesmo re le nuclear vermente, pois que il ha semper essite grande, grande companias que ha construite enorme centrales electric
LB: Okay Patrick, on this notes I’d like to close our interview and I thank you very much on behalf of Atomi per la Pace for the time you dedicated to us tonight!
LB: Ok Patrick, sur iste notas io amarea clauder nostre intervista e io regratia te multissimo in nomine de "Atomi per la Pace" per le tempore tu devotava a nos iste vespera!

LB: Since you mentioned IPCC a few times, I wanted to ask you about your recent hearing at the US Senate, which happened just a few weeks ago: can you tell us about what you brought to the discussion at the Senate?

LB: Pois que tu mentionava IPCC alicun vices, io vole te demandar re tu recente audition al senato del SUA, que occurreva justo desde alicun septimanas: pote tu dicer nos re quod tu apportava al discussion al senato?
LB: So chlorine was really the first thing that made you wonder exactly where that new Greenpeace, which you didn't really belong to in a way, was <f0>heading</f0>...
LB: Assi le chloro esseva realmente le prime cosa que ha facite demandar te exactemente a ubi celle nove Greenpeace, al qual tu realmente in un certe senso non pertineva, esseva <f0>volvente</f0>...
LB: So you your evolution took slightly longer to wonder to study yourself on the path to understand what nuclear is about, <f0>and after that you had already gone from Greenpeace with</f0>
LB: Assi tu, tu evolution prendeva legiermente plus tempore a appender, studer te mesme sur le strata pro comprender re le energia nuclear, <f0>e postquam tu jam esseva foras ab Greenpeace </f0>
LB: So, I'm a pilot, and it's interesting when you land in Schihpol people's airport, one of the few places in the Earth, when you land the altimeter goes negative...
LB: Assi, io es un pilota, e id es interessante quando tu atterra in le aeroporto del populo a Schihpol, uno del pauc locos in le terra, ubi tu atterra con le altimetro que va negative...
LB: That's what are they doing in agriculture in effect, because the use of a lot of CO2 to inject in greenhouses, so that plants grow faster.
LB: id es quod on face in agricultura in veritate, per le uso de un quantitate de CO2 a injectar in le conservatorios, de maniera que le plantas cresce plus rapide.
LB: Well, it’s interesting how politics come into play into some of this discussion threads we had, about the global warming side,
LB: ben, il es interessante como le politicos veni in joco in alicun de iste filos de discussion que nos habeva, re le calefaction global,

LB: You have been very long involved with that just because your family had a <f0>factory</f0>, so you knew exactly what they were talking about when it came to forestry, and yet again you found them with unsustainable position, about something you really know.

LB: Tu esseva multo longemente implicate con illo, sol quia tu familia habeva un <f0>factoria</f0>, sic tu cognosceva punctualmente re lo que illes parlava, quando il veniva al silvicultura, e etsi de nove tu trovava illes con position insustenibile, re aliquid vermente note pro te.
LB: sorry to interrupt, but, one of the other aspects of the golden rice is: that there’s no royalty about it!
LB: affligite interrumper, sed uno del altere aspectos del "golden rice" es: que il non ha ulle royalty circa lo!

Le formattation non-visibile (id es, que non appare como tags in le editor de OmegaT) is retenite in le documentos final.
Normally tags are ignored when considering the similarity between different texts for matching purposes.
Normalmente le tags son ignorate quando on considera le similantia inter textos differente, pro le fines del concordantia.
Normally, it is not necessary to start <a0>OmegaT</a0> from the command line.

normalmente tu incontrara concordantias partial utile post alicun tempore, ma le <t0/>file memoria de traduction "hereditage" esseva fornite pro te in iste parve instruction pro assecurar que tu trovara al minus alcuno.
