Not all CAT tools are equally strict in their observance of these definitions; consequently, some CAT tools are unable to open TMX files produced by certain other CAT tools directly.

Non omne applicationes CAT es equalmente stricte in lor observantia de iste definitiones; ita, alicun applicationes CAT es incapace a aperir directemente files TMX producite per certe altere applicationes CAT.
Not all CAT tools exhibit the same tolerance and some may not therefore display the expected matches if the language codes are not sufficiently compliant.
Non omne le applicationes CAT exhibi le mesme tolerantia et alicunos pote dunque non monstrar le previste concordantias si le codices del lingua non es satis conforme.
Not only may it be used free of charge, users are also free to make copies of it and distribute them.
Non solmente illo pote esser usate gratis, ma le usatores es etiam libere de facer copias de illo e los distribuer.
Not present
Non presente
Not to mention his care and diligence, keeping repositories intact and in good order.
Pro non mentionar su cura e diligentia pro tener le archivos intacte e in bon ordine.
Note
Nota
Note <e0>interesar</e0> and<e1> navegar</e1> in Spanish, are correctly translated as the verbs interest and sail respectively.
Nota <e0>interesar</e0> e<e1> navegar</e1> in espaniol, son rendite correctemente como verbos interest e sail respectivemente.
Note Types
Typo de notas
Note also that some fonts behave better for some language pairs than for others.
Nota alsi que alicun typo de character comportar se melio pro alicun pares de lingua que pro alteres.
Note double - character
Nota le duple - character

Note however that the numbers do not indicate how relevant the repetitions are: they could mean relatively long sentences repeated a number of times (in which case you are fortunate) or it could describe a table of keywords (not so fortunate).

Nota tamen que le numeros non indica ut pertinente es le repetitiones: illos poterea significar phrases relativemente longe repetite plure vices (in le qual caso tu es fortunate) o illo poterea describer un tabula de parolas clave (non assi fortunate).
Note however that:
Nota totevia que:
Note that '*' and '?' have special meaning in regular expressions, so wild card search, as described here, applies to exact and keyword search only (see below).
Nota que '*' e '?' ha significato special in le expressiones regular, assi le recerca con carta salvage, ut describite ci, refere se al exacte e recerca parola clave solmente (vide in sequito).
Note that <f0>Remove</f0> physically removes the selected vocabularies.
Nota que <f0>Remove</f0> elimina physicamente le vocabularios seligite.
Note that <l0>after</l0> is empty
Note que <l0>after</l0> es vacue
Note that Google Translate service is not free of charge, see chapter <l1>Installing and Running</l1> (runtime parameters) for more on that.
Nota que le servicio Google Translate non es gratuite, vide le capitulo <l1>Installar e executar</l1> (parametros runtime) pro plus sur isto.
Note that OmegaT does not support the Microsoft Office 97-2003 binary file format directly.
Nota: OmegaT non supporta directemente le formato de file binari Microsoft Office 97-2003.
Note that all parameters start with a double - character.
Nota que omne parametros initia con un character - duple.
Note that all the tmx files in the /tm repository are parsed when the project is opened, so putting all different TMs you may have on hand into this folder may unnecessarily slow OmegaT down.

Nota que omne le files TMX in le deposito /tm son analysate quando le projecto es aperte, assi tu, ponente omne le varie TMs que tu pote haber per manos in iste plica, pote inutilemente retardar OmegaT.
Note that all the translation memories are loaded into memory when the project is opened.
Nota que omne le memorias de traduction son cargate in memoria quando le projecto es aperte.
Note that bug reports and requests for enhancements are publicly visible, so you should not add any sensitive files.
Nota que le reportos de defecto e le demandas pro incrementos functional es publicamente visibile, assi tu non deberea adder alicun files sensibile.
Note that changes to the project setup may have some consequences, especially, when the project has already been started.
Nota que le cambios al preparation del projecto pote haber alicun consequentias, specialmente, quando le projecto esseva jam initiate.
Note that default segmentation rules and file filters can be overridden by project-specific setup (see above).
Nota que le regulas de segmentation base e le filtros de file pote esser superscribite per preparationes specific del projecto (vide supra).

Note that even after Word's settings have been changed so that it does not insert "nuisance" codes, for example for auto-hyphenation, such codes may still be present in the file and not removed by the change in configuration.

Nota que mesmo post que le preparationes de Word esseva cambiate de maniera que illos non insereva codices "enoiose", per exemplo pro le auto syllabation, tal codices pote ancora esser presente in le file e non removite per le cambio in le configuration.
Note that if you need or wish to use any of the launch command arguments (see above), you must use the normal installation.
Nota que si tu necessita o desidera usar omne argumentos del commando de lanceamento (vide supra), tu debe usar le installation normal.
Note that if you use the demonstration version of Iceni Infix in this procedure, your translated PDF file will bear an Iceni watermark.
Nota que si tu usa le version demonstration de Iceni Infix in iste procedura, tu file PDF rendite suffrera del filigrana Iceni.
Note that in Windows you can change the <e3><a4>OmegaT</a4>.l4J.ini</e3> file to reflect your preferences.
Nota que in Windows tu pote cambiar le file <e3><a4>OmegaT</a4>.l4J.ini</e3> pro reflecter tu preferentias.
Note that in Windows you can change the <f3>OmegaT.l4J.ini</f3> file to reflect your preferences.
Nota que in Windows tu pote cambiar le file <f3>OmegaT.l4J.ini</f3> pro reflecter tu preferentias.
Note that in addition to "source-target" dictionaries you can, using the Dictionary feature, obtain access to information such as:
Nota que in plus al dictionarios "fonte-destination" tu pote obtener, con le function Dictionario, accesso a informationes como:
Note that in some cases changes in file filters in <a1>OmegaT</a1> may lead to totally different segmentation; as a result, you will have to upgrade your translation manually in such rare cases.

Nota que in alicun casos le cambios in le filtros de file in <a1>OmegaT</a1> pote ducer a segmentation totalmente differente; in consequentia, tu debera promover tu traduction manualmente in tal rar casos.
Note that in the above case, this is just half (or even less) of the story, as the target language (Slovenian) uses declension.
Nota que in le exemplo precedente, isto es justo le medietate (o mesmo minus) del labor, pois que le lingua final (sloveno) usa le declination.
Note that in the menu <g2>Options->File Filters</g2>, the global user filters are changed, not the project filters.
Nota que in le menu <g2>Optiones->Filtros de File</g2>, son cambiate le filtros global del usator, non le filtros del projecto.
Note that it is easy to install multiple versions of OmegaT on Linux without conflicts.
Nota que il es facile installar versiones multiple de OmegaT sur Linux sin conflictos.
Note that nothing but your source segment is sent to the MT service.
Nota que sol tu segmento fonte es expedite al servicio de Traduction Automatic.
Note that only one TMX for a given language pair is possible, so if several translation memories should be involved, you will need to merge them all into the XX_YY.tmx.
Nota que sol un TMX pro un date par de linguas es possibile, ergo si deberea implicar plure memorias de traduction, tu necessitara funder los omne in le XX_YY.tmx.
Note that other CAT tools can export (and import as well) tmx files, usually in all three forms.
Nota que altere instrumentos CAT pote exportar (e importar) files tmx, habitualmente in omne le tres formas.
Note that the "Install" function requires an Internet connection.
Nota que le function "Installa" necessita un connexion a Internet.
Note that the TMX files in the tm folder can be compressed with gzip.
Nota que le le files TMX in le plica tm pote esser comprimite con gzip.
Note that the creator of the repository has implicitly the administrator rights for the repository created.
Nota: le creator del deposito ha implicitemente le privilegios del administrator pro le deposito create.
Note that the key is 38 characters long.
Note que le clave es longe 38 characteres.
Note that the opening tag must always come before the corresponding closing tag:
Nota que le tag de apertura debe semper venir ante que le tag de clausura correspondente:
Note that the structure of the source subfolder may take any form you like.
Nota que le structura del sub plicas in le sub plica /source poter sumer qualcunque forma tu vole.
Note that the team members have to be registered first, before you can add them to the project (Note: in the free version of ProjectLocker you are allowed only two users per project).
Nota que le membros del equipa debe esser registrate antea, ante que tu pote adder illes al projecto (Nota: in le version gratuite de ProjectLocker on es permittite sol duo usatores per projecto).
Note that there could be minor differences between the OmegaT counts and the numbers, provided by other CAT tools.
Nota que es possibile minor differentias inter le contos de OmegaT e le numeros fornite per altere applicationes CAT.
Note that there is no automatic “global replace” function, but there are “workarounds” that can be used.
Nota que il non habe un function automatic “Reimplacia toto”, ma il ha alcun “arrangiamentos” que on pote usar.
Note that these totals are a good (or as good as they can be) approximation of the work involved in the project and thus can serve as a basis for your cost and price calculations.
Nota que iste totales es un bon (o bon a mesura il pote esser) approximation del labor implicate in le projecto e assi pote servir como base pro le calculationes de tu costo e precio.
Note that they are all web-based: you will have to be on-line if you want to use them.
Nota que illos es omne basate sur le TTT: tu debera esser on-line si tu vole usar los.
Note that this is not the same as "deleting" the formatting, which would cause the character formatting to revert to the document's default.
Nota que isto non es le identic cosa de "cancellar" le formato, le qual causarea le retorno al formato base del character del documento.
Note that this will of course check for the standard (Castillian) rather than for Mexican Spanish.
Nota que illo naturalmente controlara pro le Standard plus tosto que pro le Espaniol Mexicano!)
Note that up to 2M characters per month are free of charge.
Nota que usque 2M characteres per mense son gratuite.
Note that you can reassign the shortcuts to your own preferences.
Nota que tu pote re-assignar le Vias breve a tu preferentias personal.
Note that you segments from order1, that are not present in order2 and other subsequent jobs, will be tagged as orphan segments; however, they will still be useful for getting fuzzy matches.
Nota que tu segmenta ex order1, illo non es presente in order2 e altere obras subsequente, essera taggate como segmentos orphane; comocunque, illos essera ancora utile pro concordantias partial.
Note that you will need the ant program (<e0>http://ant.apache.org/bindownload.cgi</e0>) to build your own version of OmegaT.
Nota que tu necessitara le programma ant (<e0>http://ant.apache.org/bindownload.cgi</e0>) pro construer tu proprie version de OmegaT.

Note that, if the point of division is not selected, the row will be divided in position 0, that is, the whole row will go down as if you introduced a blank line (it can be useful to lower all the rows one or more positions).

OmegaT selige automaticamente un tokenizer pro le lingua fonte e uno pro le lingua de destination secundo le preparationes del lingua del projecto.

OmegaT pote alinear le .properties di Java in modo consola.

OmegaT pote esser personalisate pro supportar anque altere formatos de file.

OmegaT permitte de deler le tags e de cambiar lor ordine, ma sol si alicunes regulas es exactemente sequite.
OmegaT does not have an integral preview function, but it is possible to provide much the same functionality using additional software.
OmegaT non ha un function de vista preliminar integrate, ma il es possibile provider plurime identic functionalitates usante additional software.
OmegaT does not have to be launched from the command line, but doing so may be useful as it provides debugging information.
OmegaT non debe esser lanceate ab le linea de commando, ma facer assi pote esser utile pois que illo provide information de cernita del defecto.

OmegaT has a friendly and helpful user group.

OmegaT has an inline spelling checker.
OmegaT ha un corrector orthographic integrate.

OmegaT esseva installate con bon successo sur Windows (tote le versiones a partir de Windows 98 in avante), Macintosh OS X e Linux.
OmegaT has chosen option 'Yes' automatically.
OmegaT ha selecte le option 'Si' automaticamente.

OmegaT ha filtros de file pro ambe Open Document Format e pro le formato Star Office que illo replaciava.

OmegaT in modo linea de commando
OmegaT inserts the translation of the string most similar to the current source, if it is above the similarity threshold that you have selected in this dialog.
OmegaT insere le traduction del linea maxime similabile al fonte actual, si il es supra le limine del similantia que tu ha seligite in iste fenestra de dialogo.
OmegaT interfaces to SVN and Git, two common team software versioning and revision control systems (RCS), available under an open source license.
OmegaT functiona con SVN e Git, duo commun systemas software pro equipa de controlo de version e revisio (RCS), disponibile sub licentia open source.
OmegaT is a computer-assisted translation (CAT) tool.
OmegaT es un application pro Traduction Adjutate ab Computator (Computer Aided Tanslation

OmegaT is a free and open source multiplatform Computer Assisted Translation tool with fuzzy matching, translation memory, keyword search, glossaries, and translation leveraging into updated projects.

OmegaT es un instrumento gratuite de traduction assistite ab computator, multe-platteforma con concordantia partial, recerca con parola clave, glossarios, e fruition del translation in le renovation del projectos.
OmegaT is a free translation memory application written in Java.
OmegaT es un programma gratuite pro memoria de traduction, scripte in Java;
OmegaT is a free, open-source translation memory program.
OmegaT es un programma gratuite pro memoria de traduction, open-source..
OmegaT is able to recognize that you have done this.
OmegaT es habile a recognoscer que tu ha facite isto.
OmegaT is able to store translations that are identical to the source.
OmegaT es capabile de registrar traductiones que es identic al texto primari.
OmegaT is also capable of reading glossaries in TBX, the industry-standard format for glossary files.
OmegaT is alsi capabile de leger glossarios in TBX, le formato standard del industria pro files glossario.
OmegaT is among the CAT tools for which this process can be used.
OmegaT es un application CAT pro le qual iste processo pote esser utilisate.

OmegaT is an "inline" translation memory application, meaning that you see only one copy of the text; segments which have already been translated appear as such, otherwise <t0/>the untranslated source text is displayed.

OmegaT es un application pro memoria de traduction "inline", in le senso que tu vide solmente un copia del texto; le segmentos jam rendite appare tal qual, de altere maniera es exponite <t0/>le texto primari non rendite.
OmegaT is an excellent place to start, as the price is right, it is relatively easy to learn, and it runs on MAC and under Linux, as well as Windows.
OmegaT es un excellente medio pro mitter se in cammino, pois que le precio es correcte, illo es relativemente facile a apprender, e illo functiona in MAC e sur Linux, como sur Windows.
OmegaT is an open-source application and project.
OmegaT es un application e un projecto open-source.
OmegaT is available in many different versions in order to suit a range of user requirements.
OmegaT es disponibile in multe distincte versiones pro convenir a numerose requisitos del usator.
OmegaT is capable of handling the current Microsoft Office formats directly, without conversion to or from other formats.
OmegaT is capabile de tractar le actual formatos de Microsoft Office directemente, sin conversion verso o a partir de altere formatos.
OmegaT is free software.
OmegaT es un software gratuite.

OmegaT is generally observant of the conditions and tolerant of other tools' failure to observe them; should problems arise here, however, they can generally be resolved fairly easily by a search & replace in a text editor of the illegal character in the TMX file.

OmegaT generalmente observa le conditiones del alteres applicationes e tolera lor fallimentos de los observar; problemas que deberea levar se hic, tamen, pote generalmente esser resolute assatis facilemente con un recerca & reimplacia in un editor de texto del character illegal in le file TMX.
OmegaT is instructed to use a mandatory encoding for certain file formats (Java properties etc)
OmegaT es instruite a usar un codification obligatori pro certe formatos de file (Proprietates Java etc.)
OmegaT is not particularly difficult to install or use, but it does require a willingness to read and follow the instructions.
OmegaT non es particularmente difficile a installar o usar, ma illo require bon voluntate pro leger e sequer le instructiones.
OmegaT is not yet able to detect mistakes in formatting fully automatically, so it will not prompt you if you make an error or change formatting to fit your target language better.

OmegaT non es ancora habile a discoperir in modo completemente automatic le errores in le formattation, assi illo non suggerera te si tu face an error o cambia le formattation pro adaptar lo melio a tu lingua final.
OmegaT is open-source software.
OmegaT es un software open-source.
OmegaT is refused access to the system property containing the name of your OS and/or the system property containing your home folder.
A OmegaT ha refusate le accesso al proprietate del systema continente le nomine de tu OS o al proprietate del systema continente tu plica base.
OmegaT is supplied as a package that can be downloaded from SourceForge.
OmegaT es supplite como un pacchetto que pote esser discargate ab SourceForge.
OmegaT is supplied ready-compiled for a number of platforms, including a cross-platform version.
OmegaT es supplite preste compilate pro un numero de platteformas, includente un version multe platteforma.
OmegaT is supplied with a number of very basic segmentation patterns.
OmegaT es supplite con un numero de patronos de segmentation maxime basal.
OmegaT is the original work of Keith Godfrey.
OmegaT es le opera original de Keith Godfrey.
OmegaT is to use Java Web Start.
OmegaT es usar le Java Web Start.
OmegaT is tolerant when reading TMX files: it will accept files with en-GB, en-US, en, EN, etc.
OmegaT es tolerante in le lectura del files TMX: il acceptara files con en-GB, en-US, en, EN, etc.
OmegaT is written in Java.
OmegaT es scripte in Java.
OmegaT isn't just a product; it's an exciting project, and you can be part of it.
OmegaT non es justo un producto; illo es un excitative projecto, e tu pote esser parte de illo.

OmegaT supporta versiones de tmx importate 1.1-1.4b (tote le duo nivello 1 e nivello 2).

OmegaT supporta le sequente formatos de file:

OmegaT supporta duo del popular 'systemas de controlo de version' (Version Control Systems = VCS in pauco), <u0>"Subversion" ex Apache</u0> frequentemente abbreviate in SVN, secundo le nomine del commando svn) e <u1>Git</u1>.
OmegaT thus takes the TUV segments corresponding to the project's source and target language codes and uses them as the source and target segments respectively.
OmegaT assi sume le segmentos TUV correspondente al codices fonte e destination del projecto e usa los ut segmentos fonte e destination respectivemente.
OmegaT training course.

OmegaT uses the international TMX standard as its native translation memory format.
OmegaT usa le standard TMX international qua formato de memoria de traduction su native.

OmegaT uses the standard tmx file format to store and access translation memories, which guarantees that you can exchange your translation material with other CAT applications supporting this file format.

Pro registrar e acceder al memorias de traduction, OmegaT usa le formato de file standard TMX, le qual garanti que tu pote excambiar tu production de traductiones con usatores de altere applicationes CAT que supporta le mesme formato de file.
OmegaT uses translation memories to store your previous translations and then suggest likely translations for the text you are currently working on.

Other operating systems (Linux, OS X) offer similar packages.
Altere systemas operative (Linux, OS X) offere pacchettos simile.

Other plain text file types can be handled by <a0>OmegaT</a0> by associating their file extension to a supported file type (for example, .pod files can be associated to the ASCII text filter) and by pre-processing them with specific segmentation rules.

Altere typos de file in formato texto simple pote esser tractate per <a0>OmegaT</a0> con lor extension associate al typo de file supportate (exempli gratia, le files .pod pote esser associate al filtro de texto ASCII) e con lor pre-processo per regulas de segmentation specific.
Other plain text or formatted text file formats suitable for processing in OmegaT may also exist.
Altere formatos del file texto simple o texto formattate commode pro lor processo in OmegaT pote alsi exister.
Other translations, identified specifically in the TMX, can be displayed using different colours.
Altere traductiones, identificate specificamente in le memorias TMX, pote esser monstrate con colores differente.
Other users are advised to use the <a0>Okapi Filters Plugin</a0> instead.
Altere usatores es in vice avisate a usar le <a0>Plugin Okapi Filters</a0>.

RTF (Rich Text Format):
Le Formato RTF (Rich Text Format):

RTF is structurally quite different from the Microsoft Office 98-2003 file format, but with regard to OmegaT, the same applies: it is not supported directly and must first be converted to .docx (MS Office 2007/2010) or Open Document format (LibreOffice/OpenOffice.org).

RTF es structuralmente assatis differente ab le formato de file Microsoft Office 98-2003, ma per OmegaT, on applica le mesme: illo non es supportate directemente e debe in prime loco esser convertite al formato .docx (MS Office 2007/2010) o al formato Open Document (LibreOffice/OpenOffice.org).

Recalling the provisions of the Declaration on Social and Legal Principles relating to the Protection and Welfare of Children, with Special Reference to Foster Placement and Adoption Nationally and Internationally; the United Nations Standard Minimum Rules for the Administration of Juvenile Justice (The Beijing Rules); and the Declaration on the Protection of Women and Children in Emergency and Armed Conflict, Recognizing that, in all countries in the world, there are children living in exceptionally difficult conditions, and that such children need special consideration,

Memorante le provisiones del Declaration re le Principios Social e Legal re le Protection e la Ben-esser del Infantes, con Referentia Special al Collocation Familiar e Adoption National e International; le Regulas Minime Standard del Nationes Unite pro le Administration del Justitia Juvenil (Le Regulas de Beijing); e le Declaration re le Protection del Femina e Infantes in Emergency e Conflicto Armate, Con le recognition que, in tote le paises in le mundo, il ha infantes que vive in conditiones exceptionalmente difficile, e que tal infantes necessita special consideration,

Con le recognition que le Nationes Unite ha proclamate e convenite, in le Declaration Universal del Derectos Human e in le Pactos International re le Derectos Human, que totos pote servir se de omne le derectos e libertates ibi enunciate, sin distinction de alicun genere, como racia, color, sexo, lingua, religion, opinion politic o altere opinion, origine national o social, proprietate, nascentia o altere stato,

Searches are done within the current project or in any folder or folder structure.
Le recercas es facite in le projecto actua, in qualcunque plicas o structura de sub-plicas.
Searches are performed by default in both the source and target sections of the project, but you can limit your search to just the source or the target text.
Le recercas son effectuate per arrangiamento initial in ambe le sectiones fonte e de destination del projecto, sed tu pote can limitar tu recerca al texto fonte sol o al texto de destination.
Searches can be performed in the source and/or in the translation and/or in notes and/or in comments.
Le recercas pote esser effectuate in le fonte, vel in le translation, vel in le notas, vel in le commentos.
Searches can be performed in the source and/or in the translation and/or in notes.
Le Recercas pote esser exequite in le fonte o in le traduction i in le notas.

Since it is a standard, an advantage of XLIFF is that file filters provided by one CAT tool vendor for conversion between a certain format and XLIFF (and, following completion of the translation workflow, back again) can in theory be used to prepare files in the format concerned for translation in any CAT tool capable of supporting XLIFF.

Pois que il es un standard, un avantage de XLIFF es que le filtros de file supplite per un CAT tool venditor pro le conversion inter un certe formato e XLIFF (e, postere le completamento del fluxo de labor del traduction, de nove al reverso) pote in theoria esser usate pro preparar files in le formato concernite pro traduction in qualcunque application CAT que supporta XLIFF.

So the global warming thing is an interesting discussion in general that really polarizes people too much in my opinion,
Assi le cosa del recalefaction global es un discussion interessante in general que realmente polarisa gente troppo multo in mi opinion,
So the inserted "pojavni meni" in the nominative form - has to be changed to "pojavnem meniju" , i.e. to the locative.
Assi le "pojavni meni" inserite in le forma nominative - debe esser cambiate in "pojavnem meniju" , id es al locativo.
So we can say that this type of note has
assi nos pote dicer que iste typo de nota ha
So what happened really behind the scenes when Germany decided to take this step?
Assi quod occurreva vermente detra le scenas quando le Germania decideva sumer iste grado?
So, I very much favour new research in small modular reactors and that new research will come clearly from smaller ...,
Assi, io es multissimo a favor del nove recerca in parve reactores modular e que nove recerca venira decisemente per plus parve...
So, I’m afraid once again politics came into action
Assi, io es apprehensive un vice que de nove le politicos veni in action
So, all this discussion about GMO... sorry, about nuclear in general, started also by point you made <t0/>some minutes ago,
Assi, omne iste discussion circa le GMO... regretta, circa le nuclear in general, initiava alsi ab un puncto que tu ha marcate <t0/>alicun minutas retro,
So, all this discussion about GMO... sorry, about nuclear in general, started also by point you made some minutes ago,
Assi, omne iste discussion circa GMO... sorry, circa nucleari in general, initiava alsi del puncto tu facite alicun minutas retro,

Some CAT tools solve this problem, at least for MS Word, by working within Word itself; most other CAT tools convert to RTF and back, often invisibly for the translator.

Some CAT tools still employ dedicated proprietary translation memory formats, but virtually all support the import and export of TMX files.

Some of the dictionaries have no strings attached - i.e. are "Free to use", and others, like the selection above, are under the GPL license.
Alicun del dictionarios non ha series attaccate - id es lor uso es "gratuite", e altere, como le selection supra, es sub Le licentia GPL.

Alcun del Formatos del files, specialisate pro le labor de traduction, per exemplo PO, permitte le inclusion de commentos.

Some other CAT tools are able to import and export glossary files in this format, or in a similar plain-text format which can be produced from it very easily (for example by a search & replace operation in Microsoft Word).

Alicun altere applicationes CAT es capabile de importar e exportar files glossario in iste formato, o in un formato de texto simple simile que pote esser producite de illo multo facilemente (per exemplo per un operation cerca & reimplacia in Microsoft Word).
Some project folders seem to have been moved.

Alcun vias breve implica altere claves.
Some tag manipulations are necessary and are benign, others will cause problems when the translated document is created.

Some types of source files (for instance PO, TTX, etc.) are bilingual, i.e. they serve both as a source and as a translation memory.

Sometimes you may wish to rename the files you translate automatically, for example adding a language code after the file name.

Alicun vices, comocunque, tu file rendite pote haver un aspecto singular, e – in le pejor caso – pote etiam rejectar de aperir.
Sometimes, it is useful to distinguish between high-quality translation memories and those that are, because of the subject matter, client, revision status, etc., less reliable.

The collaborative translation offered by OmegaT is based on the functionality of version or revision control, widely used by the software community to maintain control of changes to the code of a program and allow unimpeded collaboration within the development team.

Le traduction in equipa (facite in collaboration) que OmegaT offere es basate sur le 'functionalitate de version' o le 'Controlo de revision', largemente utilisate ab le communitate de software pro mantener le controlo del cambios al codice de un programma e permitter le collaboration sin impedimentos intra le equipa de disveloppamento.
The colours are displayed as long as the "Save auto-populated status" (in Options/Editing behaviour..) option is checked.
The colours are displayed as long as the "Save auto-populated status" (in Options/Editing behaviour..) option is checked.
The combined work need only contain one copy of this License, and multiple identical Invariant Sections may be replaced with a single copy.
The combined work need only contain one copy of this License, and multiple identical Invariant Sections may be replaced with a single copy.

Le commando es sensibile al maiuscolas e minuscolas.

le commando pro lancear OmegaT es:

Le classificator de configuration essera usate in vice.

Le construction

The content of a segment can be deleted completely either by means of the keyboard shortcuts Ctrl+A > Ctrl+X > Enter, by right-clicking with the mouse and the Remove Translation menu item, or simply by using the delete key (repeatedly).

Le contento de un segmento pote esser delite completemente o per medio del vias breve del claviero Ctrl+A > Ctrl+X > Enter, per click dextere con le mouse e le commando del menu Remove traduction, o simplemente usante le clave Dele (plure vices).
The content of the files is overwritten either when a new segment is opened (source.txt and target.txt) or when a new selection is exported (selection.txt).
Le contento del files es superscribite o quando un segmento nove es aperte (source.txt e target.txt) o quando a nove selection es exportate (selection.txt).
The content of the script window is editable and can be copied and pasted back into the OmegaT Editor pane.
Le contento del fenestra del script es modificabile e pote esser copiate e collate al reverso in le quadro Modifica de OmegaT.
The content of the segment source text (<f0>source.txt</f0>).
Le texto contente in le segmento original (<f0>source.txt</f0>).
The content of the segment target text (<f0>target.txt</f0>).
Le texto contente in le segmento final (<f0>target.txt</f0>).
The contents can be customized using following variables:
Le contentos pote esser personalisate con le variabiles sequente:
The contents of glossary files are kept in memory and are loaded when the project is opened or reloaded.
Le contentos del files glossario es conservate in memoria e es cargate quando le projecto es aperte o recargate.
The contents of the checkout folder will be marked accordingly:
Le contentos del plica checkout essera marcate in consequentia:
The contents of the glossary pane will be updated accordingly.
Le contentos del quadro pro le Glossario essera implementate in consequentia.
The contents of the target subfolder will reflect the current state of the translation, as present in the project translation memory, saved in the current <e8>/omegat/project_save.tmx</e8>.
Sol alora le contentos del sub plica target reflectera le stato actual del traduction, como presente in le memoria de traduction del projecto, salvate in le file <e8>/omegat/project_save.tmx</e8>.
The contents of translation memories in the tm subfolder serve to generate suggestions for the text(s) to be translated.
Le contentos del memorias de traduction in le sub plica tm serve a generar suggestiones pro le texto(s) a traducer.

Le character de controlo correspondente a x
The counters in the lower right corner keep track of the progress of the translation (numbers in the left hand column refer to the figure above):
Le contatores in le angulo dextre inferior tene tracia del progresso del traduction (le numeros in le columna sinistre refere se al figura precedente):
The created target documents are located in the <f0>target</f0> folder.
Le documentos final create es ubicate in le plica <f0>target</f0>.
The current folder will be used instead.
Essera usate in vice le classificator currente.
The current shortcut will be displayed in the relevant box.
Le via breve currente essera monstrate in le cassa apposite.
The current version of the service is based on usage, with the price of 20 USD per million characters at the time of writing.
le version actual del servicio es basate super le uso, con le precio de 20 USD per million de characteres al tempore del scriptura.
The customer wishes to receive a translation memory against which texts can be run in the future: in other words, to "pretranslate" future texts against an existing translation memory.
Le cliente desira reciper un memoria de traduction contra le qual textos pote esser exequite in le futuro: in altere parolas, a "pre render" textos futur contra un memoria de traduction existente.
The data are exported when the segment is opened.
Le datos es exportate quando le segmento es aperte.

Le vias breve initial de OmegaT es disponibile ex Sourceforge: <u0>Vias breve initial de OmegaT</u0>

Le vias breve initial de OmegaT pro le Mac es alsi disponibile ex Sourceforge, illos usa omne "meta" in vice de "ctrl": <u0>Vias breve initial de OmegaT pro le Mac</u0>
The development of an "artificial leaf" is one of the major goals of the ASU Center for Bio-Inspired Solar Fuel Production, which was the main supporter of this study.
Le disveloppamento de un "folia artificial" es un del major fin del Centro pro production de combustibile solar Bio-inspirate, que esseva le principal supporter de iste studio.

Le differentia inter "Numero de segmentos" e "Numero de segmentos unic" provide un idea approximative del numero del repetitiones in le texto.

The early Earth contained no oxygen and was converted to the oxygen-rich atmosphere we have today 2.5 billion years ago by the "invention" of the water splitting process in Photosystem II (PSII).
Le terra primitive non contineva oxygeno e esseva convertite al atmosphera ric de oxygeno, nos hodie ha 2.5 billion de annos desde le "invention" del processo de fission in le Photosystem II (PSII).

The easiest way for a customers to ensure that these two conditions are met is for them to pretranslate the text themselves before passing it to the translator (thereby defining how it is segmented), and to create the translation memory in the CAT tool of their choice after receiving the translated intermediate bilingual file from the translator (thereby ensuring that the formatting information contained within the translation memory will be compatible with future projects).

Le modo plus facile pro un cliente de assecurar se que iste duo conditiones es complite, es de pre traducer le texto ipse avante que passar lo al translator (assi definiente como illo es segmentate), e crear le memoria de traduction in le application CAT de su selection, depost que recipeva le file bilingue intermedie rendite ab le traductor (assi assecurante se que le informationes de formato continite in le memoria de traduction essera compatibile con le projectos futur).

Le fin de un linea

The entry will be greyed, if there's just one translation available.
Le entrata essera colorate gris, si il ha sol un traduction disponibile.

Le information in-line de formato facite possibile per le formatos supportate (in particular DocBook, HTML, XHTML, Open Document Format(ODF) e Office Open XML (MS Office 2007 e sequente) al tempore de scriptura) son presentate como tags in OmegaT.

The install program can create shortcuts for you in the start
Le programma de installation pote te crear vias breve in le menu de
The installation script provides added convenience, but you can still install OmegaT on Linux manually if you prefer.
Le script de installation provide convenientia additional, ma tu pote ancora installar OmegaT sur Linux manualmente si tu prefere lo.
The interface consists of a main window with table views of the source/target segments, text areas for the selected segments, menubar and function buttons.
Le interfacie consiste de un fenestra principal con le vistas del tabella del segmentos fonte/destination, areas de texto pro le segmentos seligite, barra del menu e buttones de function.
The items are not separated with a TAB character.
Le articulos non es separate con un character de tabulation.
The kaptain script (or "grammar", as kaptain scripts are termed) enables you to select launch and configuration options from a user-friendly GUI.
Le script Kaptain (o "grammatica", como le scriptes kaptain es terminate) habilita te a seliger le optiones del lanceamento e del configuration de un GUI facile.
The language code should be in the form xx-YY, xxx-YY, xx_YY or xxx_YY, where xx or xxx is the language code and YY is the region or country code (optional).
Le codice del lingua deberea esser in le forma xx-YY, xxx-YY, xx_YY o xxx_YY, ubi xx o xxx es le codice del lingua e YY es le codice del region o del pais (facultative).
The last frame offers you to have a look at the readme and changes files for the version you have installed.
Le quadro ultime offere te un reguardo al files readme e changes pro le version que tu ha installate.
The last segment with the identical source text will thus prevail (Note: of course it makes more sense to avoid this to happen in the first place).
Assi prevalera le ultime segmento con le identic texto fonte (Note: naturalmente ha plus senso evitar que isto occurre in le prime posto).
The launch scripts will not be written to your execution path in this case.
Le scripts de lanceamento non essera scripte in tu percurso de execution in iste caso.
The layout shown here is just for the sake of example; you can of course arrange the windows as you like.
Le arrangiamento monstrate hic es justo pro gratia de exemplo; tu pote naturalmente arrangiar le fenestras como tu vole.
The legacy material provided for the purpose of this tutorial is intended to demonstrate the functions of OmegaT.
Le material hereditage fornite pro iste parve instruction es designate a demonstrar le functiones de OmegaT.
The level 2 export is not fully compliant with the level 2 standard, but is sufficiently close and will generate correct matches in other translation memory tools supporting TMX Level 2.

Le exportation nivello 2 non es plenmente conforme con le standard nivello 2, ma es satis prope e generara concordantias correcte in altere applicationes memoria de traduction que supporta le TMX nivello 2.
The level1 file contains only textual information.
Le file level1 contine sol information textual.

Le quadro del Traduction Automatic, quando aperte, contine le suggestiones ex instrumentos de traductor automatic pro le segmento currente.
The main OmegaT application.
Le principal application OmegaT.
The main menu provides access to all <a0>OmegaT</a0> functions.
Le menu principal provide accesso a omne functiones de <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
The main project folder contains 3 tmx files, <f0>project_name-omegat.tmx</f0>, <f1>project_name-level1.tmx</f1> and <f2>project_name-level2.tmx</f2> (project_name being the name of your project).

Le classificator principal del projecto contine 3 files tmx, <f0>project_name-omegat.tmx</f0>, <f1>project_name-level1.tmx</f1> e <f2>project_name-level2.tmx</f2> (project_name es le nomine de tu projecto).
The main window consists of several panes, the main menu and a status bar.
Le principal fenestra consiste in plure quadros, le menu principal e un barra de stato.
The match statistics are accessed via<g0>Tools>Match Statistics.</g0> The evaluation is rather CPU intensive and can be time-consuming, so a progress bar is shown during the calculation.

Le statisticas del concordantia es accedite via<g0>Instrumentos>Statisticas del Concordantia.</g0> Le evalutation es assatis intensive pro le CPU e pote necessitar molto tempore, ergo es monstrate un barra de avantiamento durante le calculation.

The match viewer shows the most similar segments from translation memories, both from internal project translation memory created in real time as you translate your project and from ancillary translation memories you have imported from your earlier jobs, or received from your client or translation agency.

Le quadro del concordantias monstra le segmentos le plus similabile, sia ex le memoria de traduction del projecto interne create in tempore actual como tu rende tu projecto e ex memorias de traduction auxiliar que tu ha importate ex tu obras precedente, o recipite ex tu cliente o agentia del traduction.
The matches will be displayed in bold blue.
Le concordantias essera marcate in azur hardite.
The matching percentage is roughly equivalent to taking the number of common words in the matched and the matching segment and dividing by the number of words in the longer of the two.
Le percentage de concordantia es grosso modo equivalente a prender le numero de parolas commun in le segmentos concordate e divider los per le numero de parolas in le plus longe del duos.
The memory named "omegat" can be used in OmegaT itself, in future projects that you create.
Le memoria nominate "omegat" pote esser usate in OmegaT ipse, in projectos futur que tu creara.

Le minimo es 10 secundos.

Le functiones le plus frequentemente usate es accessibile con vias breve del claviero, assi un vice que tu deveni accostumate a illos, tu non necessitara plus navigar a transverso del menus durante que tu traduce.

The second of these chapters describes the various subfolders and files in a translation project and their role as well as other user and application files associated with OmegaT.
Le secundo de iste capitulos describe le varie files, plicas e sub-plicas, in un projecto de traduction e lor rolo, assi como altere files del usator e applicationes associate con OmegaT.
The second project uses an HTML file or set of files, downloaded from the Internet, and demonstrates OmegaT's capability to deal with graphics, <s0/>complex layout, and complex file structure.

Le secunde projecto usa un file o un gruppo de files HTML, discargate ex le Interrete, e demonstra le capacitate de OmegaT de tractar con graphicos, <s0/>arrangiamentos complexe, e structuras del files complexe.
The segment is opened when its segment number is entered.
Le segmento es aperte quando su numero de segmento es inscribite.
The segmentation rules are generally valid across all the projects.
Le regulas del segmentation son generalmente valide trans tote le projectos.
The segmentation settings only address the way the source files are handled by <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
Le preparationes del segmentation adressa sol le maniera con le qual le Files fonte son tractate per <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
The segments are displayed in order of appearance in the project.
Le segmentos son monstrate in ordine de apparition in le projecto.
The selected fuzzy match is highlighted in bold, words that are missing in the segment you are translating are colored blue and words adjacent to the missing parts green.
Le concordantia partial seligite es marcate in nigrato, le parolas que es mancante in le segmento que tu es rendente es colorate azur e le parolas adjacente al partes mancante in verde.
The selected languages will then be installed and will eventually appear in your spell checker setup window (this may take a while).
Le linguas seligite alora essera installate e eventualmente apparera in tu fenestra de preparation del corrector orthographic (isto pote prender un lapso).
The separators between the panes can be dragged to resize panes.
Quando isto is facite le quadros monstra un linguetta al summitate.
The server can exist in the local network but in the majority of cases it will be available on internet, i.e. via URL address.
Le server pote exister in le rete local, ma in le majoritate del casos illo essera disponibile sur interrete, id es via un adresse URL.
The server keeps the information on checkouts, so that later commits (see below) can be performed in an orderly fashion.
Le server retene le informationes discargate durante le discarga, de maniera que plus tarde le consigna (vide in infra) pote esser exequite in un maniera ordinate.
The server makes sure that any conflicting changes, due to two members working on the same checked-out contents, will be resolved.
Le server assecura se que omne cambios que conflige, per duo membros que opera sur le mesme contentos discargate, essera resolute.
The set of <e0>Unique </e0>segments is computed by taking all the segments and removing all duplicate segments.
Le serie de segmentos <e0>Unic </e0>es computate per retener omne le segmentos e remover omne le segmentos duplicate.
The settings in your project indicate which is the source and which the target language.
Le preparationes in tu projecto indica qual es le lingua fonte e qual le lingua de destination.
The shortcut characters used try to reflect the underlying meaning of the tag (e.g. b for bold, i for italics, etc.)
Le characteres de connexion usate tende a reflecter le natural significato del tag (exempli gratia b pro bold, i pro italics, etc.)
The shortcut definition file must be named <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0> and must contain at most one shortcut definition per line.
Le file definition del via breve debe esser nominate <f0>MainMenuShortcuts.properties</f0> e debe continer al maximo un definition de via breve per cata linea.

The shortcut definition syntax is the following: <c0><menu item code>=<shortcut></c0>, where <e1><menu item code></e1> is a code taken from the tables below and <e2><shortcut></e2> is a combination of pressed keys specified by the user

Le syntaxe de definition del via breve es le sequente: <c0><codice del commando del menu>=<via breve></c0>, ubi <e1><codice del commando del menu></e1> es un codice ex le tabellas sequente e <e2><via breve></e2> es un combination de percussiones de clave specificate per le usator
The shortcut selects the Nth match displayed in the match window (the first match is selected by default)
Le via breve selige le concordantia #N monstrate in le Quadro del concordantia (le prime concordantia es seligite per arrangiamento initial)
The shortcuts <k2>Ctrl+A</k2> and <k3>Ctrl+C</k3> work in panes, allowing to copy all or some of the information to the clipboard.
Le vias breve <k2>Ctrl+A</k2> e <k3>Ctrl+C</k3> opera in le quadros, permittente copiar tote o alcun del informationes al tabula del fragmento.
The simplest way to launch OmegaT, however, is to execute the<e0> <a1>OmegaT</a1>.exe</e0> program.
Le maniera plus simple pro lancear OmegaT, comocunque, es executar le programma <e0> <a1>OmegaT</a1>.exe</e0>.
The solution in our example is to copy the existing translation memory into the tm subfolder and rename it ZH_CN.tmx to indicate the target language of the tmx.
Le solution in nostre exemplo es de copiar le memoria de traduction existente in le sub plica /tm e renominar lo ZH_CN.tmx pro indicar le lingua de destination del TMX.
The solution in our example is to copy the existing translation memory into the tm/tmx2source/ subfolder and rename it ZH_CN.tmx to indicate the target language of the tmx.
Le solution in nostre exemplo es de copiar le memoria de traduction existente in le sub plica tm/tmx2source/ e renominar lo ZH_CN.tmx pro indicar le nove lingua de destination del TMX.
The solution is simple, however: 'review'.
Tamen le solution es simple: 'revider'.
The source code for a work means the preferred form of the work for
The "source code" for a work means the preferred form of the work
The source file language entered is invalid!
Le lingua del file primari inscribite es invalide!
The source segment and the fuzzy matches must contain the same list of numbers
Le segmento fonte e le concordantias partial debe continer le identic lista de numeros

The source segment in the example below was “<e0>Context menu command</e0>”, as in the Fuzzy Matches example above, and the terms shown were found in the glossaries, available (Microsoft's Term collection and Slovenian Linux User group Glossary).

Le segmento original in le exemplo sequente era “<e0>Commando del menu contexto</e0>”, como in le exemplo de concordantias partial precedente, e le terminos monstrate esseva trovate in le glossarios, disponibile (Microsoft's Term collection e Slovenian Linux User group Glossary).
The source subfolder contains files to be translated.
Le sub plica /source contine le files a traducer.
The source term does not have to be a single-word item, as the next example shows:
Le termino fonte non debe esser necessarimente de un sol parola, como monstra le exemplo sequente:
The source text
Le texto fonte
The specified translation direction is not supported
Le direction de traduction specificate non es supportate

The spell checker uses the target language code to determine the language to be used : if the target language is Brazilian Portuguese (PT_BR), the subfolder with vocabularies must contain the two vocabulary files, called <e0>pt_br.aff</e0> and <e1>pt_br.dic</e1>.

Le corrector orthographic usa le codice del lingua final pro determinar le lingua a usar: si le lingua final es brasilian portugese (PT_BR), le sub plica con le vocabularios debe continer le duo files vocabulario nominate <e0>pt_br.aff</e0> and <e1>pt_br.dic</e1>.
The standard is still undergoing development; this is what the different versions refer to.
Le standard es ancora in evolution; i.e. le differente versiones refere se a.
The statistics shown is available as a tab-separated <f1>project_stats.txt</f1> file (subfolder <f2>omegat</f2>), ready to be loaded into a spreadsheet program for the user's convenience.

Le statisticas monstrate es disponibile como un file 'separate per signos de tabulation' <f1>project_stats.txt</f1> (sub plica <f2>omegat</f2>), preste a esser cargate in un programma de folio de calculo pro le commoditate del usator.
The statistics window - accessed via <e0>Tools>Statistics </e0>- shows the statistics of the current OmegaT project, both in the summary form as well as in detail for every file to be translated.
Le fenestra del statisticas - accedite con <e0>Instrumentos>Statisticas </e0>- monstra le statisticas del projecto OmegaT actual, sia in le forma summario sia in detalio pro cata file a traducer.
The status bar displays work-flow related messages at the bottom of the main window.
Le barra de stato monstra messages pertinente le fluxo de labor al fundo del fenestra principal.
The structure of folders and subfolders must be retained.
Le structura del plicas e del sub plicas debe esser retenite.
The symbol for your macro should appear in the toolbar.
Le symbolo pro tu macro deberea apparer in le barra del instrumentos.
The syntax is as follows:
Le syntaxe es como seque:
The syntax of the language pattern conforms to regular expression syntax.
Le syntaxe del schema del lingua conforma al syntaxe del expression regular.
The system maintains versioning for data shared
Le systema gere le controlo de version pro le datos in commun
The system will output details of the Java version already installed at system level.
Le systema emittera detalios del version de Java jam installate a nivello de systema.
The systematic
The systematic
The tab character ('\u0009')
Le character de tabulation ('\u0009')
The table provides a summary of web pages available, for which our tutorial's “legacy” files have been constructed:
Le tabula provide un summario de paginas TTT disponibile, pro le qual nostre files “hereditage” del parve instruction esseva struite:
The tag validation window detects and lists any tag errors and inconsistencies in the translation.
Le fenestra de validation del tag releva e lista omne errores del tag e contradictiones in le traduction.
The tags are displayed in a different font in order to make them less intrusive.
Le tags es monstrate in un differente typo de character pro render los minus intrusive.
The tags are highlighted in bold blue for easy comparison between the original and the translated contents.
Le tags es marcate in blau nigrato pro un facile comparation inter los original e le contentos rendite.
The tags consist of one to three characters and a number.
Le tags consiste de uno a tres characteres e un numero.
The tags in OmegaT are greyed, so they are easy to recognise.
Le tags in OmegaT son gris, assi illos son facile a recognoscer.
The target filename pattern uses a special syntax, so if you wish to edit this field, you must click <e0>Edit...</e0>and use the <i1/>Edit Pattern Dialog.
Le modello nomine de file de destination usa un syntaxe special, assi si tu desidera modificar iste campo, tu debe cliccar <e0>Modifica...</e0>e usar le <i1/>Fenestra de dialogo del Modifica Modello.
The target text entered after that will be treated as an alternative translation of the source segment.
Le texto final inscribite post que essera tractate ut un traduction alternative del segmento original.
The team can also use the same subfolder structure for the target files.
Le equipa pote alsi usar le mesme structura de sub plica pro le files final.
The term "Move to inside segment" means, that the cursor moves to the beginning of the segment if it was previously before the segment, and to the end of the segment if it was previously after it.
Le termino "mover se a le interior del segmento" significa, que le cursor se move al initio del segmento si illo esseva anterior al segmento, e al fin del segmento si illo esseva posterior.
The terms of this
The terms of this
The text below assumes that "Basic" is selected.
Le texto sequente assume que es seligite "Basic".
The text could not be translated
Le texto non pote esser rendite
The text export function exports data from within the current <a0>OmegaT</a0> project to plain text files.
Le function Exporta texto, exporta datos ex le projecto actual de <a0>OmegaT</a0> in files de texto simple.
The text export function exports data from within the current OmegaT project to plain-text files.
Le function de exportation del texto exporta datos ex le projecto OmegaT currente in files de texto simple.
The text highlighted by the user, when <k0>Ctrl+Shift+C</k0> is pressed or <g1>Edit > Export Selection</g1> is selected (<f2>selection.txt</f2>).
Le texto marcate per le usator, quando es calcate <k0>Ctrl+Shift+C</k0> o es seligite <g1>Modifica > Exporta le Selection</g1> (<f2>selection.txt</f2>).
The text is exported to a plain text file.
Le texto es exportate in un file de texto simple.
The text search (find) function
Function recerca del texto (discoperir)
The text size exceeds the maximum
Le dimension del texto supera le maximo
The third column can be used for additional information.
Le tertie columna pote esser usate pro information additional (commentos).
The third option, i.e. installing an OmegaT version with Java included at local level, is always the "safe" option, and is recommended.
Le tertie option, id es installar un version de OmegaT con Java includite a nivello local, es semper le option "secur", e es recommendate.
The title of the dialog reflects the file actually used (which depends on how many instances of OmegaT are running concurrently).
Le titulo del fenestra de dialogo reflecte le file actualmente usate (que depende de quante instantias de OmegaT es fluente concurrently).
The tmx file can be given any name you specify.
Al file TMX pote esser date omne nomine que tu attribue.
The tokenizer names are given in the Readme.txt file distributed with the tokenizer files.
Le nomines del tokenizer es date in le file Readme.txt distribuite con le files tokenizer.
The top left of the window shows us the current note type.
Le summitate sinistre del fenestra monstra nos le typo de nota.
The top match is 100%, because all words match.
Le concordantia summe es 100%, proque omne parolas concorda.
The top right of the window shows us the deck cards will be added to.
Le summitate dextre del fenestra monstra nos le cartas del fasce que essera addite.

The traditional Wordfast translation memory file format is of particular interest owing to its simplicity: it consists of a plain-text file with a translation unit (segment) on each line in which the source and target are separated by a tab.

Le traditional formato de memoria de traduction de Wordfast es de particular interesse debite a su simplicitate: il consiste de un file de texto simple con un elemento de traduction (segmento) sur cata linea in le qual le origine e le destination es separate con un tabulation.
The translated documents are automatically generated in their original format in the <f0>/target </f0>folder.
Le documentos rendite es automaticamente generate in lor formato original in le plica <f0>/target </f0>.
The translated file language entered is invalid!
Le lingua del file rendite inscribite es invalide!
The translated files will then need to be converted back to the original format.
Le files rendite necessitara deinde esser convertite a reverso al formato original.
The translated text can then be re-imported into Infix Professional.
Le texto rendite pote pois esser re-importate in Infix Professional.
The translation has changed.
Le traduction cambiava.
The translation in this tmx can be either
Le traduction in iste TMX pote esser o
The translation may for example be passed to a checker for editing.
Le traduction pote per exemplo esser passate a un corrector pro lo editar.
The translation stage is only part of the customer's workflow.
Le stadio del traduction es sol parte del fluxo de labor del cliente.
The translation work
Le labor de traduction

The translator can add notes to the opened segment, for instance to come back later to the segment and redo the translation, check that alternative translations are correct or to ask colleagues for their opinion.

Le traductor pote adder notas al segmento aperte, per exemplo pro retornar plus tarde al segmento e refacer le traduction, controlar que le traductiones alternative es correcte o pro demandar al collegas lor opinion.
The translator has a text containing the phrase "abc", and has completed a first draft of it, translating "abc" as "abc".
Le traductor ha un texto continente le phrase "abc", e ha clause un prime minuta de illo, rendente "abc" quam "abc".
The translator will be shown English translations for source segments in Dutch and use them to create the Chinese translation.
Al traductor essera monstrate le traductiones anglese pro le segmentos fonte in nederlandese e usar los pro crear le traduction chinese.
The two entries required are available in your <u1>account page</u1> under Primary account key and Customer-ID:
Le duo entratas requirite son disponibile in tu <u1>pagina del conto</u1> sub clave del conto Primari e Customer-ID:
The two types of rules behave as follows:
Le duo typos de regulas conduce se como seque:
The underlined item "pop-up menu" can be found in the glossary pane as "pojavni menu".
Le termino sublineate del "menu pop-up" pote esser trovate in le quadro pro le Glossario como "pojavni menu".

The upper part is in the source language, in bold characters with a green background color, the lower part is the editing field, ended by a marker: <i0/>the marker is <l1><segment nnnn></l1> where nnnn is a number of the segment in the project.

Le parte superior es in le lingua original, in characteres nigrate con un color de fundo verde, le parte inferior es le campo de modifica, terminate per un marcator: <i0/>le marcator es <l1><segment nnnn></l1> ubi nnnn es le un numero del segmento in le projecto.
The user can therefore see immediately that a segment in grey, rather than black, has already been checked.
Le usator pote in consequentia vider immediatemente que un segmento in gris, plus tosto que nigre, esseva jam verificate.
The user group also serves as the main point of contact between users and the project team.
Le Gruppo del usator alsi servi como le principal puncto de contacto inter usatores e equipa del projecto.
The user interface
Le interfacie del usator
The user interface and documentation were originally written in English.
Le interfacie del usator e le documentation esseva in origine scribite in anglese.
The user manual is an HTML document with links to different chapters.
Le manual del usator es un documento HTML con ligamines a capitulos varie.
The user manual is in the package you just downloaded, you can access it from
Le manual del usator es in le pacchetto que tu ha justo discargate, tu pote acceder lo per

The user manual is located in the docs subfolder under the OmegaT installation folder, so you may can, for instance, view the English documentation by opening the <f0>docs/en/index.html </f0>file in your browser.

Le manual del usator es ubicate in le sub plica /docs sub le plica de installation de OmegaT, assi tu potera, per exemplo, examinar le documentation anglese per aperir le file <f0>docs/en/index.html </f0>in tu lector.

The user who needs to handle MS Office files will find it helpful to convert them using Open Office free software; the files can can then be saved in a Microsoft format, if desired, after the translation is finished.

Le usator qui necessita tractar files MS Office trovara adjuvante converter los con le programma gratuite Open Office que lege le formatos MS e converte los in 'open format'; postquam le traduction es clause, le files pote esser salvate, si desiderate, in formato Microsoft.
The user, however, may need to generate a set of rules, specific to the project in question.
Le usator, tamen, pote necessitar de generar un serie de regulas, specific pro le projecto in question.
The validate tags function detects changes to tag sequences (whether deliberate or accidental), and shows the affected segments.
Le function valida tags releva cambios al sequentias del tag (an deliberate o accidental), e monstra le segmentos affligite.
The vocabulary entry can have a comment added.
Al entrata del vocabulario pote esser addite un commento.
The warning takes the form of the text in the script window being highlighted in yellow.
Le advertimento sume le forma del texto in le fenestra de script essente marcate in jalne.
The whole process can be steered and controlled via Tck/Tcl-based scripting.
Toto le processo pote esser governate e controlate con scriptes basate sur Tck/Tcl.
The window that opens when <g2>Ctrl+Shift+V</g2> is pressed features a 3-column table with a link to the segment, the original segment and the target segment
Le fenestra que aperi quando es pulsate <g2>Ctrl+Shift+V</g2> forni un tabella a tres columnas con un ligamine al segmento, loe segmento fonte e le segmento de destination.
The window that opens when <g2>Ctrl+T</g2> is pressed features a 3-column table with a link to the segment, the original segment and the target segment
Le fenestra que se displica quando es pulsate <g2>Ctrl+T</g2> functiona con un tabella de 3 columnas con un ligamine al segmento, le segmento fontal e le segmento de destination

The windows in the above screenshot have been reduced in size in order to show the idea of keeping OmegaT and the source text (in your browser) open at the same time; normally, you will probably want the OmegaT window to be maximized.

Le fenestras in the super screenshot esseva reducite in dimension pro monstrar le idea de tener OmegaT e le texto fonte (in tu navigator) aperite al mesme tempore; normalmente, tu probabilemente volera maximisar le sol fenestra OmegaT.
The word [Fuzzy] is displayed on the source segment.
Le parola [Fuzzy] es monstrate sur the segmento fonte.

Le parola ante le signo '=' es le termino original, e su traduction es le parola(s) post le signo '='.

Le file glossario scribibile non se trova intra le plica del glossario
The writeable glossary file must be inside the glossary folder
Le file glossario scribibile debe trovar se intra le classificator del glossario

Le sito TTT de<u0> <a1>OmegaT</a1> </u0>contine ligamines verso numerose ressources <a2>OmegaT</a2>.
Then click on <e0>Search</e0> button to display all the corresponding occurrences.
Clicca alora sur le button <e0>Cerca</e0> pro monstrar omne le occurrentias correspondente.
Then enter the launch command itself, and confirm with ENTER.
Ergo inscribe le commando ipse de lanceamento, e confirma con ENTER.
Then move the end of the highlighting one character to the left so that it does not include the paragraph mark.
Pois move le fin del marca un character al sinistre de sorta que il non include le marca del paragrapho.
Then on the right, under Macros, select levelformat (or whatever you called your macro).
Pois al dextra, sub Macros, selige "levelformat" (o qual que sia tu ha lo nominate).
Then save the changes and re-export the PDF to the XML file (and change the file extension etc.), and reload your OmegaT project.
Pois salva le cambios e re exporta le PDF al file XML (e cambia le extension del file etc.), e recarga tu projecto OmegaT.
Then select "Paste Special" (Word 2003) or click on the arrow at the bottom of the "Insert" button (Word 2007) to obtain the extended Paste options.
Pois selige "Colla Special" (Word 2003) o clicca sur le sagitta al base del button "Insere" (Word 2007) pro obtener le optiones Colla extendite.
Then tick the "Export the segment to text files" box.
Pois marca le cassa: "Exporta le segmento in files de texto".

Then use File > Open to open any short MS Word document in the source language.
Dunque usa File > Aperi pro aperir qualcunque curte documento MS Word in le lingua initial.
Then while translating from Canadian French your project will use all the rules defined for all the language chain in the correct order.
Alora in le traduction ab le francese canadian tu projecto usara omne le regulas definite for omne le catena del lingua in le correcte arrangiamento.
Then you need a translation in e.g. Chinese, but your translator does not understand Dutch; she, however, understands perfectly English.
Pois tu necessita un traduction in, per exemplo, chinese, ma tu traductor non comprende le nederlandese; ille, comocunque, comprende a perfection le anglese.
Then, after selecting a suitable menu, add a submenu/item with <e0>File - New</e0> Submenu and <e1>File - New Item</e1>.

Eo, sur le linea de commando, scribe:

Il ha plure restrictiones:

Il ha in veritate tres concordantia estimate disponibile (66/66/30 in le caso del concordantia #4 precedente).

There are at least three reasons why a customer may request delivery of a translation in a particular bilingual file format (rather than simply delivery of the translated file and possibly also the translation memory):

Il ha al minus tres rationes proque un cliente pote demandar le livration de un traduction in un particular formato de file bilingue (plus tosto que simplemente livration del file rendite e possibilemente alsi le memoria de traduction):
There are basically three ways to address this problem in <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
Il ha in fundo tres manieras pro abbordar iste problema in <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
There are basically two types of file formats, plain text and formatted text.
Il ha basicamente duo typos de formatos de file, texto simple e texto formattate.
There are duplicate sets of these buttons for source and target texts.
Il ha le collectiones duplice de iste buttones pro texto fonte e le texto de destination.
There are essentially two ways in which you can do this.
On ha essentialmente duo manieras pro lo far.
There are free clients for Anki available on many
Il ha clientes gratuite pro Anki disponibile sur multe
There are no terms in the current segment which match any terms in the glossary.
Il non ha nulle terminos in le segmento currente que concorda con alicun terminos in le glossario.

There are numerous ways of achiving this, but one practical solution is to use a script which "listens" for changes in the translated file(s) produced by OmegaT and then, when a change is detected, automatically launches the utility which converts the file(s) to html format in order for them to be read by the browser.

Il ha numerose manieras de obtener isto, ma un solution practic es de usar un script que "ascolta" le cambios in le file(s) rendite producite per OmegaT e alora, quando un cambio es detectate, automaticamente lancea le utilitate que converte le file(s) in formato html pro los render legibile al lector del tela.
There are several methods to specify the file's encoding so that its contents are not garbled when opened in <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
Il ha plure methodos pro specificar le codification del file de maniera que su contentos non es alterate quando aperte in <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
There are two possibilities to run an SVN server: you can install SVN on your own server or you can use a hosted service.
Il ha duo possibilitates pro exequer un server SVN: tu pote install SVN sur tu proprie server o tu pote usar un servicio hospite.
There are two reasons for this:
Il ha duo rationes pro isto:
There are two simple concepts behind Anki: 'active recall testing' and 'spaced
Il ha duo simple conceptos detra Anki: 'Test de Revocation Active' e 'Repetition
There are two strategies for segments that contain only such invariable text.
Il ha duo strategias pro le segmentos que contine solmente tal texto invariabile.
There are two ways of launching <a1>OmegaT</a1> using the command line.
Il ha duo manieras de lancear <a1>OmegaT</a1> per un linea de commando.
There is a strong possibility that at some points, your translation will be longer than the original.
Il ha un forte possibilitate que a alicun punctos, tu traduction essera plus longe que lo original.
There is however considerable scope within the project for users to suggest improvements and influence the course of future development.
Il ha totevia considerabile campo intra le projecto pro le usatores per suggerer meliorationes e influentiar le curso de evolution futur.

Use "Software Update..." from the Apple menu to update your Java version.

Use <e0><a1>OmegaT</a1>.jar</e0> file located in <e2><a3>OmegaT</a3>.app/Contents/Resources/Java/</e2> to launch <a4>OmegaT</a4> from the command line.

Use <e1>Ctrl+PgUp/PgDn</e1> (Cmd+PgUp/PgDn on Mac) to switch successively from <e2>Glossaries entries</e2>, <e3>Auto-text entries,</e3> <e4>Missing tags</e4> and <e5>Character table</e5> options.

Usa <e1>Ctrl+PgUp/PgDn</e1> (Cmd+PgUp/PgDn sur Mac) pro commutar successivemente intra le optiones <e2>Entratas del Glossarios</e2>, <e3>Entratas de Auto-texto,</e3> <e4>Tags perdite</e4> e <e5>Tabella del Characteres</e5>.
Use <g0>Ctrl+L<i1/></g0> to open and <k2>Esc</k2> to close it.
Usa <g0>Ctrl+L<i1/></g0> pro aperir e <k2>Esc</k2> pro clauder lo.

usa le macro pro nivellar le formato sol sur paragraphos con pauc o nulle formato.

Users of old computers who feel window resizing is very slow can try changing the font.
